1418958Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Func<object[], object> CreateConstructorDelegate(ConstructorInfo method)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine        var args = Expression.Parameter(typeof(object[]), "args");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var parameters = new List<Expression>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var methodParameters = method.GetParameters().ToList();Di2015NewLine        for (var i = 0; i < methodParameters.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            parameters.Add(Expression.Convert(Di2015NewLine                               Expression.ArrayIndex(args, Expression.Constant(i)),Di2015NewLine                               methodParameters[i].ParameterType));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var call = Expression.Convert(Expression.New(method, parameters), typeof(object));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Expression body = call;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var callExpression = Expression.Lambda<Func<object[], object>>(body, args);Di2015NewLine        var result = callExpression.Compile();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1421320Di2015UniqueSeparator    public bool Equals(EqualityTest other)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (ReferenceEquals(null, other))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (ReferenceEquals(this, other))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Equals(other.A, A) && Equals(other.B, B);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool Equals(object obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (ReferenceEquals(null, obj))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (ReferenceEquals(this, obj))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (obj.GetType() != typeof(EqualityTest))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Equals((EqualityTest)obj);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override int GetHashCode()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        uncheckedDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return ((A != null ? 1422346Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic bool CompareByteArrays(byte[] lValue, byte[] rValue)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if(lValue == rValue) return true; // referentially equalDi2015NewLine    if(lValue == null || rValue == null) return false; // one is null, the other is notDi2015NewLine    if(lValue.Length != rValue.Length) return false; // different lengthsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for(int i = 0; i < lValue.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(lValue[i] != rValue[i]) return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1424986Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class EnumUtilsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static Nullable<T> Parse<T>(string input) where T : structDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //since we cant do a generic type constraintDi2015NewLine        if (!typeof(T).IsEnum)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Generic Type 'T' must be an Enum");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(input))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (Enum.GetNames(typeof(T)).Any(Di2015NewLine                  e => e.Trim().ToUpperInvariant() == input.Trim().ToUpperInvariant()))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return (T)Enum.Parse(typeof(T), input, true);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1436358Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static char ToHexDigit(int i) {Di2015NewLine    if (i < 10) Di2015NewLine        return (char)(i + '0');Di2015NewLine    return (char)(i - 10 + 'A');Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic static string ToHexString(byte[] bytes) {Di2015NewLine    var chars = new char[bytes.Length * 2 + 2];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    chars[0] = '0';Di2015NewLine    chars[1] = 'x';Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < bytes.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine        chars[2 * i + 2] = ToHexDigit(bytes[i] / 16);Di2015NewLine        chars[2 * i + 3] = ToHexDigit(bytes[i] % 16);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return new string(chars);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1437655Di2015UniqueSeparator<script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">Di2015NewLine    function OnTreeClick(evt) {Di2015NewLine        var src = window.event != window.undefined ? window.event.srcElement : evt.target;Di2015NewLine        var isChkBoxClick = (src.tagName.toLowerCase() == "input" && src.type == "checkbox");Di2015NewLine        if (isChkBoxClick) {Di2015NewLine            var parentTable = GetParentByTagName("table", src);Di2015NewLine            var nxtSibling = parentTable.nextSibling;Di2015NewLine            if (nxtSibling && nxtSibling.nodeType == 1)//check if nxt sibling is not null & is an element nodeDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (nxtSibling.tagName.toLowerCase() == "div") //if node has childrenDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //check or uncheck children at all levelsDi2015NewLine                    CheckUncheckChildren(parentTable.nextSibling, src.checked);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            //check or uncheck parents at all levelsDi2015NewLine            CheckUncheckParents(src, src.checked);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    function CheckUncheckChildren(childContainer, check) {Di2015NewLine        var childChkBoxes = childContainer.getElementsByTagName("input");Di2015NewLine        var childChkBoxCount = childChkBoxes.length;Di2015NewLine        for (var i = 0; i < childChkBoxCount; i++) {Di2015NewLine            childChkBoxes[i].checked = check;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    function CheckUncheckParents(srcChild, check) {Di2015NewLine        var parentDiv = GetParentByTagName("div", srcChild);Di2015NewLine        var parentNodeTable = parentDiv.previousSibling;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (parentNodeTable) {Di2015NewLine            var checkUncheckSwitch;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (check) //checkbox checkedDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var isAllSiblingsChecked = AreAllSiblingsChecked(srcChild);Di2015NewLine                if (isAllSiblingsChecked)Di2015NewLine                    checkUncheckSwitch = true;Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    return; //do not need to check parent if any(one or more) child not checkedDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else //checkbox uncheckedDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                checkUncheckSwitch = false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var inpElemsInParentTable = parentNodeTable.getElementsByTagName("input");Di2015NewLine            if (inpElemsInParentTable.length > 0) {Di2015NewLine                var parentNodeChkBox = inpElemsInParentTable[0];Di2015NewLine                parentNodeChkBox.checked = checkUncheckSwitch;Di2015NewLine                //do the same recursivelyDi2015NewLine                CheckUncheckParents(parentNodeChkBox, checkUncheckSwitch);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    function AreAllSiblingsChecked(chkBox) {Di2015NewLine        var parentDiv = GetParentByTagName("div", chkBox);Di2015NewLine        var childCount = parentDiv.childNodes.length;Di2015NewLine        for (var i = 0; i < childCount; i++) {Di2015NewLine            if (parentDiv.childNodes[i].nodeType == 1) //check if the child node is an element nodeDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (parentDiv.childNodes[i].tagName.toLowerCase() == "table") {Di2015NewLine                    var prevChkBox = parentDiv.childNodes[i].getElementsByTagName("input")[0];Di2015NewLine                    //if any of sibling nodes are not checked, return falseDi2015NewLine                    if (!prevChkBox.checked) {Di2015NewLine                        return false;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //utility function to get the container of an element by tagnameDi2015NewLine    function GetParentByTagName(parentTagName, childElementObj) {Di2015NewLine        var parent = childElementObj.parentNode;Di2015NewLine        while (parent.tagName.toLowerCase() != parentTagName.toLowerCase()) {Di2015NewLine            parent = parent.parentNode;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return parent;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine</script>Di2015NewLine

1438153Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string[] InfixToPostfix( string[] infixArray )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine\var stack = new Stack<string>();Di2015NewLine\var postfix = new Stack<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine\string st;Di2015NewLine\for ( int i = 0 ; i < infixArray.Length ; i++ )Di2015NewLine\{Di2015NewLine\\if ( !( "()*/+-".Contains( infixArray[ i ] ) ) )Di2015NewLine\\{Di2015NewLine\\\postfix.Push(infixArray[i]);Di2015NewLine\\}Di2015NewLine\\elseDi2015NewLine\\{Di2015NewLine\\\if ( infixArray[ i ].Equals( "(" ) )Di2015NewLine\\\{Di2015NewLine\\\\stack.Push( "(" );Di2015NewLine\\\}Di2015NewLine\\\else if ( infixArray[ i ].Equals( ")" ) )Di2015NewLine\\\{Di2015NewLine\\\\st = stack.Pop();Di2015NewLine\\\\while ( !( st.Equals( "(" ) ) )Di2015NewLine\\\\{Di2015NewLine\\\\\postfix.Push( st );Di2015NewLine\\\\\st = stack.Pop();Di2015NewLine\\\\}Di2015NewLine\\\}Di2015NewLine\\\elseDi2015NewLine\\\{Di2015NewLine\\\\while ( stack.Count > 0 )Di2015NewLine\\\\{Di2015NewLine\\\\\st = stack.Pop();Di2015NewLine\\\\\if ( RegnePrioritet( st ) >= RegnePrioritet( infixArray[ i ] ) )Di2015NewLine\\\\\{Di2015NewLine\\\\\\postfix.Push(st);Di2015NewLine\\\\\}Di2015NewLine\\\\\elseDi2015NewLine\\\\\{Di2015NewLine\\\\\\stack.Push( st );Di2015NewLine\\\\\\break;Di2015NewLine\\\\\}Di2015NewLine\\\\}Di2015NewLine\\\\stack.Push( infixArray[ i ] );Di2015NewLine\\\}Di2015NewLine\\}Di2015NewLine\}Di2015NewLine\while ( stack.Count > 0 )Di2015NewLine\{Di2015NewLine\\postfix.Push(stack.Pop());Di2015NewLine\}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine\return postfix.Reverse().ToArray();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1446634Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass Program {Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args) {Di2015NewLine        var d = new Dictionary<string, string> { { "Name", "World" } };Di2015NewLine        var t = new Test();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(t.Replace("Hello {Name}", d));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(t.Replace("Hello {{Name}}", d));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(t.Replace("Hello {{{Name}}}", d));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(t.Replace("Hello {{{{Name}}}}", d));Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass Test {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Regex MatchNested = new Regex(Di2015NewLine        @"\\{ (?>Di2015NewLine                ([^{}]+)Di2015NewLine              | \\{ (?<D>)Di2015NewLine              | \\} (?<-D>)Di2015NewLine              )*Di2015NewLine              (?(D)(?!))Di2015NewLine           \\}",Di2015NewLine             RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespaceDi2015NewLine           | RegexOptions.Compiled Di2015NewLine           | RegexOptions.Singleline);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string Replace(string input, Dictionary<string, string> vars) {Di2015NewLine        Matcher matcher = new Matcher(vars);Di2015NewLine        return MatchNested.Replace(input, matcher.Replace);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private class Matcher {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private Dictionary<string, string> Vars;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Matcher(Dictionary<string, string> vars) {Di2015NewLine            Vars = vars;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string Replace(Match m) {Di2015NewLine            string name = m.Groups[1].Value;Di2015NewLine            int length = (m.Groups[0].Length - name.Length) / 2;Di2015NewLine            string inner = (length % 2) == 0 ? name : Vars[name];Di2015NewLine            return MakeString(inner, length / 2);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private string MakeString(string inner, int braceCount) {Di2015NewLine            StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(inner.Length + (braceCount * 2));Di2015NewLine            sb.Append('{', braceCount);Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(inner);Di2015NewLine            sb.Append('}', braceCount);Di2015NewLine            return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1452445Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplication9 {Di2015NewLine    class Program {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        class MyObject {Di2015NewLine            public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static void CallWhereMethod() {Di2015NewLine            List<MyObject> myObjects = new List<MyObject>() { Di2015NewLine                new MyObject { Name = "Jon Simpson" },Di2015NewLine                new MyObject { Name = "Jeff Atwood" }Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Func<MyObject, bool> NameEquals = BuildEqFuncFor<MyObject>("Name", "Jon Simpson");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // The Where method lives on the Enumerable type in System.LinqDi2015NewLine            var whereMethods = typeof(System.Linq.Enumerable)Di2015NewLine                .GetMethods(BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.Public)Di2015NewLine                .Where(mi => mi.Name == "Where"); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(whereMethods.Count());Di2015NewLine            // 2 (There are 2 methods that are called Where)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            MethodInfo whereMethod = null;Di2015NewLine            foreach (var methodInfo in whereMethods) {Di2015NewLine                var paramType = methodInfo.GetParameters()[1].ParameterType;Di2015NewLine                if (paramType.GetGenericArguments().Count() == 2) {Di2015NewLine                    // we are looking for  Func<TSource, bool>, the other has 3Di2015NewLine                    whereMethod = methodInfo;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // we need to specialize it Di2015NewLine            whereMethod = whereMethod.MakeGenericMethod(typeof(MyObject));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var ret = whereMethod.Invoke(myObjects, new object[] { myObjects, NameEquals }) as IEnumerable<MyObject>;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var item in ret) {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(item.Name);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // outputs "Jon Simpson"Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static Func<T, bool> BuildEqFuncFor<T>(string prop, object val) {Di2015NewLine            return t => t.GetType().InvokeMember(prop, BindingFlags.GetProperty,Di2015NewLine                                                 null, t, null) == val;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args) {Di2015NewLine            CallWhereMethod();Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1456879Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void Delete(PARAMETERS)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var previous = FindPreviousNode(PARAMETERS);Di2015NewLine    if( previous == null && Matches(f, PARAMETERS)) {Di2015NewLine      f = f.Next;Di2015NewLine    } else if(previous != null ) {Di2015NewLine      previous.Next = previous.Next.Next;Di2015NewLine    } // u could add "else { throw new NodeNotFound() }" if that's appropiateDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineprivate Node FindPreviousNode(PARAMETERS) {Di2015NewLine    Node currentNode = f;Di2015NewLine    while (currentNode != null) {Di2015NewLine        if (Matches(currentNode.Next, PARAMETERS)) {Di2015NewLine            return currentNode;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        currentNode = currentNode.Next;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1458806Di2015UniqueSeparator    static public int ConvertColourToWindowsRGB(Color dotNetColour)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int winRGB = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // windows rgb values have byte order 0x00BBGGRRDi2015NewLine        winRGB |= (int)dotNetColour.R;Di2015NewLine        winRGB |= (int)dotNetColour.G << 8;Di2015NewLine        winRGB |= (int)dotNetColour.B << 16;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return winRGB;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static public Color ConvertWindowsRGBToColour(int windowsRGBColour)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int r = 0, g = 0, b = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // windows rgb values have byte order 0x00BBGGRRDi2015NewLine        r = (windowsRGBColour & 0x000000FF);Di2015NewLine        g = (windowsRGBColour & 0x0000FF00) >> 8;Di2015NewLine        b = (windowsRGBColour & 0x00FF0000) >> 16;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Color dotNetColour = Color.FromArgb(r, g, b);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return dotNetColour;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

1460122Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic Type GetTypeFromNullableAlias(string name)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (name.EndsWith("?"))Di2015NewLine        return typeof(Nullable<>).MakeGenericType(Di2015NewLine            GetTypeFromAlias(name.Substring(0, name.Length - 1)));Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        return GetTypeFromAlias(name);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic Type GetTypeFromAlias(string name)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    switch (name)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case "bool": return typeof(System.Boolean);Di2015NewLine        case "byte": return typeof(System.Byte);Di2015NewLine        case "sbyte": return typeof(System.SByte);Di2015NewLine        case "char": return typeof(System.Char);Di2015NewLine        case "decimal": return typeof(System.Decimal);Di2015NewLine        case "double": return typeof(System.Double);Di2015NewLine        case "float": return typeof(System.Single);Di2015NewLine        case "int": return typeof(System.Int32);Di2015NewLine        case "uint": return typeof(System.UInt32);Di2015NewLine        case "long": return typeof(System.Int64);Di2015NewLine        case "ulong": return typeof(System.UInt64);Di2015NewLine        case "object": return typeof(System.Object);Di2015NewLine        case "short": return typeof(System.Int16);Di2015NewLine        case "ushort": return typeof(System.UInt16);Di2015NewLine        case "string": return typeof(System.String);Di2015NewLine        default: throw new ArgumentException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1460314Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IList<IObject> SumAccounts(IEnumerable<IObject> data)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<IObject> ret = new List<IObject>();Di2015NewLine    Dictionary<string, IObject> map = new Dictionary<string, IObject>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var item in data)        Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IObject existing;Di2015NewLine        if (!map.TryGetValue(item.Account, out existing))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            existing = new IObject(item.Account, 0m);Di2015NewLine            map[item.Account] = existing;Di2015NewLine            ret.Add(existing);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        existing.Amount += item.Amount;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return ret;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1463691Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string GetLastLine(Stream stream, Encoding enc) {Di2015NewLine  const int64 range = 100;Di2015NewLine  var found = false;Di2015NewLine  var index = stream.Length;Di2015NewLine  var data = new byte[range];Di2015NewLine  var builder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine  while ( true ) { Di2015NewLine    index = Math.Max(0, index -= range); Di2015NewLine    var count = stream.Read(data, 0, data.Length);Di2015NewLine    if ( count == 0 ) {Di2015NewLine      break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    var text = enc.GetString(data, 0, count);Di2015NewLine    var newLineIndex = text.Index(Environment.NewLine);Di2015NewLine    if ( newLineIndex >= 0 ) {Di2015NewLine      builder.Insert(text.SubString(newLineIndex+Environment.NewLine.Length),0);Di2015NewLine      break; Di2015NewLine    } else { Di2015NewLine      builder.Insert(text, 0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  return builder.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1464683Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string GetPhysicalPathFromVirtual(string rootPath, string virtualPath)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    const string mandatoryVirtualPrefix = "/virtualroot/";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!virtualPath.StartsWith(mandatoryVirtualPrefix))Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException(virtualPath, string.Format("Virtual '{0}' path must start with mandatory prefix '{1}'", virtualPath, mandatoryVirtualPrefix));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var relativePath = virtualPath.Substring(mandatoryVirtualPrefix.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var rootUri = new Uri(rootPath, UriKind.Absolute);Di2015NewLine    var relativeUri = new Uri(relativePath, UriKind.Relative);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var absoluteUri = new Uri(rootUri, relativeUri);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!rootUri.IsBaseOf(absoluteUri))Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException(virtualPath, string.Format("Virtual path '{0}' can't be outside of root '{1}'", virtualPath, rootPath));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return absoluteUri.LocalPath;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1468081Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string MagicFunctionIO(this string self, string prefix)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  string terminator = self.GetLineTerminator();Di2015NewLine  using (StringWriter writer = new StringWriter())Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    using (StringReader reader = new StringReader(self))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      bool first = true;Di2015NewLine      string line;Di2015NewLine      while ((line = reader.ReadLine()) != null)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        if (!first)Di2015NewLine          writer.Write(terminator);Di2015NewLine        writer.Write(prefix + line);Di2015NewLine        first = false;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      return writer.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static string GetLineTerminator(this string self)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  if (self.Contains("\\r\\n")) // windowsDi2015NewLine    return "\\r\\n";Di2015NewLine  else if (self.Contains("\\n")) // unixDi2015NewLine    return "\\n";Di2015NewLine  else if (self.Contains("\\r")) // macDi2015NewLine    return "\\r";Di2015NewLine  else // default, unknown env or no line terminatorsDi2015NewLine    return Environment.NewLine;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1472689Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static long FindPosition(Stream stream, byte[] byteSequence)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (byteSequence.Length > stream.Length)Di2015NewLine        return -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    byte[] buffer = new byte[byteSequence.Length];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (BufferedStream bufStream = new BufferedStream(stream, byteSequence.Length))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int i;Di2015NewLine        while ((i = bufStream.Read(buffer, 0, byteSequence.Length)) == byteSequence.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (byteSequence.SequenceEqual(buffer))Di2015NewLine                return bufStream.Position - byteSequence.Length;Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                bufStream.Position -= byteSequence.Length - PadLeftSequence(buffer, byteSequence);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return -1;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static int PadLeftSequence(byte[] bytes, byte[] seqBytes)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int i = 1;Di2015NewLine    while (i < bytes.Length)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int n = bytes.Length - i;Di2015NewLine        byte[] aux1 = new byte[n];Di2015NewLine        byte[] aux2 = new byte[n];Di2015NewLine        Array.Copy(bytes, i, aux1, 0, n);Di2015NewLine        Array.Copy(seqBytes, aux2, n);Di2015NewLine        if (aux1.SequenceEqual(aux2))Di2015NewLine            return i;Di2015NewLine        i++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return i;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1473616Di2015UniqueSeparatorint days = 30;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Gather the data we have in the database, which will be incomplete for the graph (i.e. missing dates/subsystems).Di2015NewLinevar dataQuery =Di2015NewLine    from tr in SourceDataTableDi2015NewLine    where (DateTime.UtcNow - tr.CreatedTime).Days < 30Di2015NewLine    group tr by new { tr.CreatedTime.Date, tr.Subsystem } into gDi2015NewLine    orderby g.Key.Date ascending, g.Key.SubSystem ascendingDi2015NewLine    select new MyResults()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Date = g.Key.Date, Di2015NewLine        SubSystem = g.Key.SubSystem,Di2015NewLine        Count = g.Count()Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Generate the list of subsystems we want.Di2015NewLinevar subsystems = new[] { SubSystem.Foo, SubSystem.Bar }.AsQueryable();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Generate the list of Dates we want.Di2015NewLinevar datetimes = new List<DateTime>();Di2015NewLinefor (int i = 0; i < days; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    datetimes.Add(DateTime.UtcNow.AddDays(-i).Date);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Generate the empty table, which is the shape of the output we want but without counts.Di2015NewLinevar emptyTableQuery =Di2015NewLine    from dt in datetimesDi2015NewLine    from subsys in subsystemsDi2015NewLine    select new MyResults()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Date = dt.Date, Di2015NewLine        SubSystem = subsys,Di2015NewLine        Count = 0Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Perform an outer join of the empty table with the real data and use the magic DefaultIfEmptyDi2015NewLine// to handle the "there's no data from the database case".Di2015NewLinevar finalQuery =Di2015NewLine    from e in emptyTableQueryDi2015NewLine    join realData in dataQuery on Di2015NewLine        new { e.Date, e.SubSystem } equals Di2015NewLine        new { realData.Date, realData.SubSystem } into gDi2015NewLine    from realDataJoin in g.DefaultIfEmpty()Di2015NewLine    select new MyResults()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Date = e.Date,Di2015NewLine        SubSystem = e.SubSystem,Di2015NewLine        Count = realDataJoin == null ? 0 : realDataJoin.CountDi2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinereturn finalQuery.OrderBy(x => x.Date).AsEnumerable();Di2015NewLine
1473633Di2015UniqueSeparator   private void Details_Click(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      tryDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        // the original source is what was clicked. 1478699Di2015UniqueSeparatorCREATE PROCEDURE crosstab Di2015NewLine@select varchar(8000),Di2015NewLine@sumfunc varchar(100), Di2015NewLine@pivot varchar(100), Di2015NewLine@table varchar(100) Di2015NewLineASDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDECLARE @sql varchar(8000), @delim varchar(1)Di2015NewLineSET NOCOUNT ONDi2015NewLineSET ANSI_WARNINGS OFFDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineEXEC ('SELECT ' + @pivot + ' AS pivot INTO ##pivot FROM ' + @table + ' WHERE 1=2')Di2015NewLineEXEC ('INSERT INTO ##pivot SELECT DISTINCT ' + @pivot + ' FROM ' + @table + ' WHERE ' Di2015NewLine+ @pivot + ' Is Not Null')Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSELECT @sql='',  @sumfunc=stuff(@sumfunc, len(@sumfunc), 1, ' END)' )Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSELECT @delim=CASE Sign( CharIndex('char', data_type)+CharIndex('date', data_type) ) Di2015NewLineWHEN 0 THEN '' ELSE '''' END Di2015NewLineFROM tempdb.information_schema.columns Di2015NewLineWHERE table_name='##pivot' AND column_name='pivot'Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSELECT @sql=@sql + '''' + convert(varchar(100), pivot) + ''' = ' + Di2015NewLinestuff(@sumfunc,charindex( '(', @sumfunc )+1, 0, ' CASE ' + @pivot + ' WHEN ' Di2015NewLine+ @delim + convert(varchar(100), pivot) + @delim + ' THEN ' ) + ', ' FROM ##pivotDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDROP TABLE ##pivotDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSELECT @sql=left(@sql, len(@sql)-1)Di2015NewLineSELECT @select=stuff(@select, charindex(' FROM ', @select)+1, 0, ', ' + @sql + ' ')Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineEXEC (@select)Di2015NewLineSET ANSI_WARNINGS ONDi2015NewLine

1479503Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Panel CreateFloatingPanel(Panel originalPanel)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(originalPanel.Width, Di2015NewLine        originalPanel.Height);Di2015NewLine    Rectangle rect = new Rectangle(0, 0, Di2015NewLine        bmp.Width, bmp.Height);Di2015NewLine    originalPanel.DrawToBitmap(bmp, rect);Di2015NewLine    foreach (Control ctrl in originalPanel.Controls)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ctrl.Visible = false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    using (Graphics g = Graphics.FromHwnd(originalPanel.Handle))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        g.DrawImage(bmp, 0, 0);Di2015NewLine        bmp.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        SolidBrush brush = Di2015NewLine            new SolidBrush(Color.FromArgb(128, Color.Gray));Di2015NewLine        g.FillRectangle(brush, rect);Di2015NewLine        brush.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Panel floater = new Panel();Di2015NewLine    floater.Size = originalPanel.Size;Di2015NewLine    floater.Left = originalPanel.Left - 50;Di2015NewLine    floater.Top = originalPanel.Top - 50;Di2015NewLine    this.Controls.Add(floater);Di2015NewLine    floater.BringToFront();Di2015NewLine    return floater;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1480061Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Person {Di2015NewLine    public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public static House House { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Person(string name, House house) {Di2015NewLine        Name = name;Di2015NewLine        House = house;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override string ToString() {Di2015NewLine        return String.Concat(Name, ", ", House);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class House {Di2015NewLine    public double SquareFootage { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public House(double sqft) { SquareFootage = sqft; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override string ToString() {Di2015NewLine        return String.Format("House - {0} sq. ft.", SquareFootage);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineHouse danAndKatsHouse = new House(1000.0);Di2015NewLineHouse johnsHouse = new House(2000.0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePerson dan = new Person("Dan", danAndKatsHouse);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// outputs "Dan, House - 1000 sq. ft." as expectedDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(dan);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePerson kat = new Person("Kat", danAndKatsHouse);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// outputs "Kat, House - 1000 sq. ft.", again as expectedDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(kat);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePerson john = new Person("John", johnsHouse);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// outputs "John, House - 2000 sq. ft.", so far so good...Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(john);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// but what's this? suddenly dan and kat's house has changed?Di2015NewLine// outputs "Dan, House - 2000 sq. ft."Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(dan);Di2015NewLine

1480061Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Person {Di2015NewLine    public int Id { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int HouseId { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static int LastIdValue { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    private static Dictionary<int, Person> People { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static Person() {Di2015NewLine        LastIdValue = 0;Di2015NewLine        People = new Dictionary<int, Person>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // make the constructor private to disallow direct instantiationDi2015NewLine    private Person(int id, string name, int houseId) {Di2015NewLine        Id = id;Di2015NewLine        Name = name;Di2015NewLine        HouseId = houseId;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // only permit construction through this function, which insertsDi2015NewLine    // the new Person into the static dictionary before returning itDi2015NewLine    static public Person NewPerson(string name, int houseId) {Di2015NewLine        Person p = new Person(LastIdValue++, name, houseId);Di2015NewLine        People.Add(p.Id, p);Di2015NewLine        return p;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static public Person getPersonById(int id) {Di2015NewLine        Person p = null;Di2015NewLine        return People.TryGetValue(id, out p) ? p : null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class House {Di2015NewLine    public int Id { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public int SquareFootage { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static int LastIdValue { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    private static Dictionary<int, House> Houses { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static House() {Di2015NewLine        LastIdValue = 0;Di2015NewLine        Houses = new Dictionary<int, House>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // make the constructor private to disallow direct instantiationDi2015NewLine    private House(int id, int sqft) {Di2015NewLine        Id = id;Di2015NewLine        SquareFootage = sqft;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // only permit construction through this function, which insertsDi2015NewLine    // the new House into the static dictionary before returning itDi2015NewLine    static public House NewHouse(int sqft) {Di2015NewLine        House h = new House(LastIdValue++, sqft);Di2015NewLine        Houses.Add(h.Id, h);Di2015NewLine        return h;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static public House getHouseById(int id) {Di2015NewLine        House h = null;Di2015NewLine        return Houses.TryGetValue(id, out h) ? h : null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineHouse firstHouse = House.NewHouse(1000.0);Di2015NewLineHouse secondHouse = House.NewHouse(2000.0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePerson dan = Person.NewPerson("Dan", firstHouse.Id);Di2015NewLinePerson kat = Person.NewPerson("Kat", firstHouse.Id);Di2015NewLinePerson john = Person.NewPerson("John", secondHouse.Id);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineHouse dansHouse = House.getHouseById(dan.HouseId);Di2015NewLineHouse katsHouse = House.getHouseById(kat.HouseId);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// this printsDi2015NewLineif (katsHouse == dansHouse) { Console.WriteLine("Dan and Kat live in the same house."); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// this also printsDi2015NewLineif (dansHouse == firstHouse) { Console.WriteLine("Dan and Kat live in the first house."); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// this does not printDi2015NewLineif (dansHouse == secondHouse) { Console.WriteLine("Dan and Kat live in the second house."); }Di2015NewLine

1482415Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Type GetUnderlyingType(this Type source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (source.IsGenericTypeDi2015NewLine        && (source.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == typeof(Nullable<>)))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // source is a Nullable type so return its underlying typeDi2015NewLine        return Nullable.GetUnderlyingType(source);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // source isn't a Nullable type so just return the original typeDi2015NewLine    return source;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1483596Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Dictionary<string, string> SplitToDictionary(string input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return new Regex(@"\\[([^\\]]+)\\]([^\\[]+)").Matches(input).Cast<Match>().ToDictionary(x => x.Groups[1].Value, x => x.Groups[2].Value.Trim());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1483596Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Dictionary<string, string> SplitToDictionary(string input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Regex regex = new Regex(@"\\[([^\\]]+)\\]([^\\[]+)");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Dictionary<string, string> result = new Dictionary<string, string>();Di2015NewLine    foreach (Match match in regex.Matches(input))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        result.Add(match.Groups[1].Value, match.Groups[2].Value.Trim());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1483861Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string Encrypt(this string stringToEncrypt, string key)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(stringToEncrypt))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentException("An empty string value cannot be encrypted.");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(key))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentException("Cannot encrypt using an empty key. Please supply an encryption key.");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters cspp = new System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters();Di2015NewLine            cspp.KeyContainerName = key;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider rsa = new System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider(cspp);Di2015NewLine            rsa.PersistKeyInCsp = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            byte[] bytes = rsa.Encrypt(System.Text.UTF8Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(stringToEncrypt), true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return BitConverter.ToString(bytes);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine
1483861Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string Decrypt(this string stringToDecrypt, string key)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string result = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(stringToDecrypt))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentException("An empty string value cannot be encrypted.");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(key))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentException("Cannot decrypt using an empty key. Please supply a decryption key.");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters cspp = new System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters();Di2015NewLine                cspp.KeyContainerName = key;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider rsa = new System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider(cspp);Di2015NewLine                rsa.PersistKeyInCsp = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                string[] decryptArray = stringToDecrypt.Split(new string[] { "-" }, StringSplitOptions.None);Di2015NewLine                byte[] decryptByteArray = Array.ConvertAll<string, byte>(decryptArray, (s => Convert.ToByte(byte.Parse(s, System.Globalization.NumberStyles.HexNumber))));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                byte[] bytes = rsa.Decrypt(decryptByteArray, true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                result = System.Text.UTF8Encoding.UTF8.GetString(bytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // no need for further processingDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

1484769Di2015UniqueSeparatorVaryQualityLevel
1484769Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void VaryQualityLevel()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Get a bitmap.Di2015NewLine    Bitmap bmp1 = new Bitmap(@"c:\\TestPhoto.jpg");Di2015NewLine    ImageCodecInfo jgpEncoder = GetEncoder(ImageFormat.Jpeg);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Create an Encoder object based on the GUIDDi2015NewLine    // for the Quality parameter category.Di2015NewLine    System.Drawing.Imaging.Encoder myEncoder =Di2015NewLine        System.Drawing.Imaging.Encoder.Quality;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Create an EncoderParameters object.Di2015NewLine    // An EncoderParameters object has an array of EncoderParameterDi2015NewLine    // objects. In this case, there is only oneDi2015NewLine    // EncoderParameter object in the array.Di2015NewLine    EncoderParameters myEncoderParameters = new EncoderParameters(1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    EncoderParameter myEncoderParameter = new EncoderParameter(myEncoder, Di2015NewLine        50L);Di2015NewLine    myEncoderParameters.Param[0] = myEncoderParameter;Di2015NewLine    bmp1.Save(@"c:\\TestPhotoQualityFifty.jpg", jgpEncoder, Di2015NewLine        myEncoderParameters);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    myEncoderParameter = new EncoderParameter(myEncoder, 100L);Di2015NewLine    myEncoderParameters.Param[0] = myEncoderParameter;Di2015NewLine    bmp1.Save(@"c:\\TestPhotoQualityHundred.jpg", jgpEncoder, Di2015NewLine        myEncoderParameters);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Save the bitmap as a JPG file with zero quality level compression.Di2015NewLine    myEncoderParameter = new EncoderParameter(myEncoder, 0L);Di2015NewLine    myEncoderParameters.Param[0] = myEncoderParameter;Di2015NewLine    bmp1.Save(@"c:\\TestPhotoQualityZero.jpg", jgpEncoder, Di2015NewLine        myEncoderParameters);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate ImageCodecInfo GetEncoder(ImageFormat format)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ImageCodecInfo[] codecs = ImageCodecInfo.GetImageDecoders();Di2015NewLine    foreach (ImageCodecInfo codec in codecs)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (codec.FormatID == format.Guid)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return codec;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1484846Di2015UniqueSeparatorconst String fileName = @"foo.ini";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineconst String entryExpression = @"^\\s*(?<key>[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9]*)\\s*=" + Di2015NewLine                               @"\\s*(?<value>[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9]*)\\s*$";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDictionary<String,String> entries = new Dictionary<String, String>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach (String line in File.ReadAllLines(fileName))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Match match = Regex.Match(line, entryExpression);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (match.Success)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        String key = match.Groups["key"].Value;Di2015NewLine        String value = match.Groups["value"].Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (entries.ContainsKey(key))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Overwriting the key '{0}'.", key);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        entries[key] = value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Detected malformed entry '{0}'.", line);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1484960Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class EchoStream : MemoryStream {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private ManualResetEvent m_dataReady = new ManualResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLine    private byte[] m_buffer;Di2015NewLine    private int m_offset;Di2015NewLine    private int m_count;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void Write(byte[] buffer, int offset, int count) {Di2015NewLine        m_buffer = buffer;Di2015NewLine        m_offset = offset;Di2015NewLine        m_count = count;Di2015NewLine        m_dataReady.Set();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override int Read(byte[] buffer, int offset, int count) {Di2015NewLine        if (m_buffer != null) {Di2015NewLine            Array.Copy(m_buffer, buffer, m_count);Di2015NewLine            m_buffer = null;Di2015NewLine            return m_count;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else {Di2015NewLine            // Block until the stream has some more data.Di2015NewLine            m_dataReady.Reset();Di2015NewLine            m_dataReady.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine            Array.Copy(m_buffer, buffer, m_count);Di2015NewLine            m_buffer = null;Di2015NewLine            return m_count;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1485684Di2015UniqueSeparator  [AuthorizeAttributeCustom(RoleRequired = GoodRoles.YourRoleTypeHere)]Di2015NewLine
1485684Di2015UniqueSeparator//http://stackoverflow.com/questions/977071/redirecting-unauthorized-controller-in-asp-net-mvc/977112#977112Di2015NewLine    [AttributeUsage(AttributeTargets.Class | AttributeTargets.Method, Inherited = true, AllowMultiple = false)]Di2015NewLine    public sealed class AuthorizeAttributeCustom : AuthorizeAttributeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// The name of the view to render on authorization failure.  Default is "Error".Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public string ViewName { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public ViewDataDictionary ViewDataDictionary { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public DeniedAccessView DeniedAccessView { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private GoodRoles roleRequired = GoodRoles.None;Di2015NewLine        public GoodRoles RoleRequired { get{ return roleRequired;} set{ roleRequired = value;} } // this may evolve into sets and intersections with an array but KISSDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public AuthorizeAttributeCustom()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ViewName = "DeniedAccess";Di2015NewLine            DeniedAccessView = new DeniedAccessViewDi2015NewLine                                   {Di2015NewLine                                       FriendlyName = "n/a",Di2015NewLine                                       Message = "You do not have sufficient privileges for this operation."Di2015NewLine                                   };Di2015NewLine            ViewDataDictionary = new ViewDataDictionary(DeniedAccessView);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void CacheValidateHandler(HttpContext context, object data, ref HttpValidationStatus validationStatus)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            validationStatus = OnCacheAuthorization(new HttpContextWrapper(context));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override void OnAuthorization(AuthorizationContext filterContext)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (filterContext == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentNullException("filterContext");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!filterContext.HttpContext.User.Identity.IsAuthenticated)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // auth failed, redirect to login pageDi2015NewLine                filterContext.Result = new HttpUnauthorizedResult();Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (RoleRequired == GoodRoles.None || filterContext.HttpContext.User.IsInRole(RoleRequired.ToString()))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // is authenticated and is in the required roleDi2015NewLine                SetCachePolicy(filterContext);Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            filterContext.Result = new ViewResult { ViewName = ViewName, ViewData = ViewDataDictionary };Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void SetCachePolicy(AuthorizationContext filterContext)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // ** IMPORTANT **Di2015NewLine            // Since we're performing authorization at the action level, the authorization code runsDi2015NewLine            // after the output caching module. In the worst case this could allow an authorized userDi2015NewLine            // to cause the page to be cached, then an unauthorized user would later be served theDi2015NewLine            // cached page. We work around this by telling proxies not to cache the sensitive page,Di2015NewLine            // then we hook our custom authorization code into the caching mechanism so that we haveDi2015NewLine            // the final say on whether a page should be served from the cache.Di2015NewLine            HttpCachePolicyBase cachePolicy = filterContext.HttpContext.Response.Cache;Di2015NewLine            cachePolicy.SetProxyMaxAge(new TimeSpan(0));Di2015NewLine            cachePolicy.AddValidationCallback(CacheValidateHandler, null /* data */);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

1487076Di2015UniqueSeparator    private bool HasGenericTypeBase(Type type, Type genericType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (type != typeof(object))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (type.IsGenericType && type.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == genericType) return true;Di2015NewLine            type = type.BaseType;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

1492724Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class SeptetsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    readonly List<byte> _bytes = new List<byte>();Di2015NewLine    private int _currentBit, _currentByte;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void EnsureSize(int index)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (_bytes.Count < index + 1)Di2015NewLine            _bytes.Add(0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Add(bool bitVal)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        EnsureSize(_currentByte);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (bitVal)Di2015NewLine            _bytes[_currentByte] |= (byte)(1 << _currentBit);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _currentBit++;Di2015NewLine        if (_currentBit == 8)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _currentBit = 0;Di2015NewLine            _currentByte++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void AddSeptet(byte septet)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int n = 0; n < 7; n++)Di2015NewLine            Add(((septet & (1 << n)) != 0 ? true : false));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void AddSeptets(byte[] septets)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int n = 0; n < septets.Length; n++)Di2015NewLine            AddSeptet(septets[n]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public byte[] ToByteArray()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return _bytes.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static byte[] Pack(byte[] septets)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var packer = new Septets();Di2015NewLine        packer.AddSeptets(septets);Di2015NewLine        return packer.ToByteArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1499690Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic int GetLeadingNumber(string input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    char[] chars = input.ToCharArray();Di2015NewLine    int lastValid = -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for(int i = 0; i < chars.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(Char.IsDigit(chars[i]))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lastValid = i;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if(lastValid >= 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return int.Parse(new string(chars, 0, lastValid + 1));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return -1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1500852Di2015UniqueSeparator        public static Color ColorFromAhsb(int a, float h, float s, float b)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (0 > a || 255 < a)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("a");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (0f > h || 360f < h)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("h");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (0f > s || 1f < s)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("s");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (0f > b || 1f < b)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("b");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (0 == s)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return Color.FromArgb(a, Convert.ToInt32(b * 255),Di2015NewLine              Convert.ToInt32(b * 255), Convert.ToInt32(b * 255));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        float fMax, fMid, fMin;Di2015NewLine        int iSextant, iMax, iMid, iMin;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (0.5 < b)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            fMax = b - (b * s) + s;Di2015NewLine            fMin = b + (b * s) - s;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            fMax = b + (b * s);Di2015NewLine            fMin = b - (b * s);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        iSextant = (int)Math.Floor(h / 60f);Di2015NewLine        if (300f <= h)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            h -= 360f;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        h /= 60f;Di2015NewLine        h -= 2f * (float)Math.Floor(((iSextant + 1f) % 6f) / 2f);Di2015NewLine        if (0 == iSextant % 2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            fMid = h * (fMax - fMin) + fMin;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            fMid = fMin - h * (fMax - fMin);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        iMax = Convert.ToInt32(fMax * 255);Di2015NewLine        iMid = Convert.ToInt32(fMid * 255);Di2015NewLine        iMin = Convert.ToInt32(fMin * 255);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        switch (iSextant)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case 1:Di2015NewLine                return Color.FromArgb(a, iMid, iMax, iMin);Di2015NewLine            case 2:Di2015NewLine                return Color.FromArgb(a, iMin, iMax, iMid);Di2015NewLine            case 3:Di2015NewLine                return Color.FromArgb(a, iMin, iMid, iMax);Di2015NewLine            case 4:Di2015NewLine                return Color.FromArgb(a, iMid, iMin, iMax);Di2015NewLine            case 5:Di2015NewLine                return Color.FromArgb(a, iMax, iMin, iMid);Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                return Color.FromArgb(a, iMax, iMid, iMin);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Form1_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var bmp = new Bitmap("c:\\\\bw.bmp");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (int y in Enumerable.Range(0, bmp.Height))Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            foreach (int x in Enumerable.Range(0,bmp.Width))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var p = bmp.GetPixel(x, y);Di2015NewLine                var h = p.GetHue();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var c = ColorFromAhsb(p.A, p.GetHue() + 200, p.GetSaturation() + 0.5f, p.GetBrightness());Di2015NewLine                bmp.SetPixel(x, y, c);                    Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        pictureBox1.Image = bmp;Di2015NewLine        //bmp.Dispose();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1505444Di2015UniqueSeparator /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Encrypts the string.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="text">The text.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>Encrypted string</returns>Di2015NewLine        public string EncryptString(string text)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // LocalsDi2015NewLine            var passphrase = ConfigurationManager.AppSettings["Your Encrypt Passphrase"];Di2015NewLine            byte[] results;Di2015NewLine            var utf8 = new UTF8Encoding();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Step 1. We hash the passphrase using MD5Di2015NewLine            // We use the MD5 hash generator as the result is a 128 bit byte arrayDi2015NewLine            // which is a valid length for the TripleDES encoder we use belowDi2015NewLine            var hashProvider = new MD5CryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine            var tdesKey = hashProvider.ComputeHash(utf8.GetBytes(passphrase));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Step 2. Create a new TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider objectDi2015NewLine            // Step 3. Setup the encoderDi2015NewLine            var tdesAlgorithm = new TripleDESCryptoServiceProviderDi2015NewLine                                    {Di2015NewLine                                        Key = tdesKey,Di2015NewLine                                        Mode = CipherMode.ECB,Di2015NewLine                                        Padding = PaddingMode.PKCS7Di2015NewLine                                    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Step 4. Convert the input string to a byte[]Di2015NewLine            var dataToEncrypt = utf8.GetBytes(text);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Step 5. Attempt to encrypt the stringDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var encryptor = tdesAlgorithm.CreateEncryptor();Di2015NewLine                results = encryptor.TransformFinalBlock(dataToEncrypt, 0, dataToEncrypt.Length);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Clear the TripleDes and Hashprovider services of any sensitive informationDi2015NewLine                tdesAlgorithm.Clear();Di2015NewLine                hashProvider.Clear();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Step 6. Return the encrypted string as a base64 encoded stringDi2015NewLine            return Convert.ToBase64String(results);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Decrypts the string.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="text">The text.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>Decrypted string</returns>Di2015NewLine        public string DecryptString(string text)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // LocalsDi2015NewLine            var passphrase = ConfigurationManager.AppSettings["Your Encrypt Passphrase"];Di2015NewLine            byte[] results;Di2015NewLine            var utf8 = new UTF8Encoding();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Step 1. We hash the passphrase using MD5Di2015NewLine            // We use the MD5 hash generator as the result is a 128 bit byte arrayDi2015NewLine            // which is a valid length for the TripleDES encoder we use belowDi2015NewLine            var hashProvider = new MD5CryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine            var tdesKey = hashProvider.ComputeHash(utf8.GetBytes(passphrase));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Step 2. Create a new TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider objectDi2015NewLine            // Step 3. Setup the decoderDi2015NewLine            var tdesAlgorithm = new TripleDESCryptoServiceProviderDi2015NewLine                                    {Di2015NewLine                                        Key = tdesKey,Di2015NewLine                                        Mode = CipherMode.ECB,Di2015NewLine                                        Padding = PaddingMode.PKCS7Di2015NewLine                                    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Step 4. Convert the input string to a byte[]Di2015NewLine            var dataToDecrypt = Convert.FromBase64String(text);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Step 5. Attempt to decrypt the stringDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var decryptor = tdesAlgorithm.CreateDecryptor();Di2015NewLine                results = decryptor.TransformFinalBlock(dataToDecrypt, 0, dataToDecrypt.Length);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Clear the TripleDes and Hashprovider services of any sensitive informationDi2015NewLine                tdesAlgorithm.Clear();Di2015NewLine                hashProvider.Clear();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Step 6. Return the decrypted string in UTF8 formatDi2015NewLine            return utf8.GetString(results);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

1505594Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic string IPAddrToBinary( string input) {Di2015NewLine   // assumes a valid IP Address formatDi2015NewLine   return String.Join(".", (input.Split('.').Select(x => Convert.ToString(Int32.Parse(x), 2).PadLeft(8, '0'))).ToArray());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1505594Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic string IPAddrToBinary(string input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return String.Join(".", ( // join segmentsDi2015NewLine        input.Split('.').Select( // split segments into a string[]Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // take each element of array, name it "x",Di2015NewLine            //   and return binary format stringDi2015NewLine            x => Convert.ToString(Int32.Parse(x), 2).PadLeft(8, '0')Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // convert the IEnumerable<string> to string[],Di2015NewLine        // which is 2nd parameter of String.JoinDi2015NewLine        )).ToArray());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1505604Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Form1()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    this.InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Just to illustrate - can be done in the designer.Di2015NewLine    this.timer.Interval = 1000; // One second.Di2015NewLine    this.timer.Enable = true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate Int32 state = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void timer_Tick(Object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if ((0 <= this.state) && (this.state < 30)) // Hit text box 1 30 times.Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        SendKeys.Send(this.richTextBox1.Text);Di2015NewLine        SendKeys.Send("{ENTER}");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (this.state == 30) // Hit text box 2 once.Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        SendKeys.Send(this.richTextBox2.Text);Di2015NewLine        SendKeys.Send("{ENTER}");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if ((31 <= this.state) && (this.state < 40)) // Do nothing 9 times.Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Do nothing.Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new InvalidOperationException(); // Unexpected state.Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Update state.Di2015NewLine    this.state = (this.state + 1) % 40;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1505604Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Form1()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    this.InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Just to illustrate - can be done in the designer.Di2015NewLine    this.timer.Interval = 1000; // One second.Di2015NewLine    this.timer.Enable = true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate Int32 state = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void timer_Tick(Object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Decimal n1 = this.numericUpDown1.Value;Di2015NewLine    Decimal n2 = this.numericUpDown2.Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if ((0 <= this.state) && (this.state < n1))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        SendKeys.Send(this.richTextBox1.Text);Di2015NewLine        SendKeys.Send("{ENTER}");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (this.state == n1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        SendKeys.Send(this.richTextBox2.Text);Di2015NewLine        SendKeys.Send("{ENTER}");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if ((n1 <= this.state) && (this.state < n1 + n2))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Do nothing.Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Reset state to resolve race conditions.Di2015NewLine        this.state = 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Update state.Di2015NewLine    this.state = (this.state + 1) % (n1 + n2);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1511188Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Executes a method in a separate AppDomain.  This should serve as a simple replacementDi2015NewLine    /// of running code in a separate process via a console app.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static T RunInAppDomain<T>(Func<T> func)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        AppDomain domain = AppDomain.CreateDomain("Delegate Executor " + func.GetHashCode(), null,Di2015NewLine            new AppDomainSetup { ApplicationBase = Environment.CurrentDirectory });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            domain.SetData("toInvoke", func);Di2015NewLine            domain.DoCallBack(() => Di2015NewLine            { Di2015NewLine                var f = AppDomain.CurrentDomain.GetData("toInvoke") as Func<T>;Di2015NewLine                AppDomain.CurrentDomain.SetData("result", f());Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return (T)domain.GetData("result");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            AppDomain.Unload(domain);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [Serializable]Di2015NewLine    private class ActionDelegateWrapperDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public Action Func;Di2015NewLine        public int Invoke()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Func();Di2015NewLine            return 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void RunInAppDomain(Action func)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        RunInAppDomain<int>( new ActionDelegateWrapper { Func = func }.Invoke );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

1515090Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static PdfPTable GetHFCell(string header, string footer, string text)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        PdfPTable pdft;Di2015NewLine        PdfPCell hc;Di2015NewLine        PdfPCell fc;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        pdft = new PdfPTable(1);Di2015NewLine        pdft.WidthPercentage = 100f;Di2015NewLine        pdft.DefaultCell.Border = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        hc = new PdfPCell(new Phrase(header));Di2015NewLine        hc.Top = 0f;Di2015NewLine        hc.FixedHeight = 7f;Di2015NewLine        hc.HorizontalAlignment = 1;Di2015NewLine        hc.BackgroundColor = iTextSharp.text.Color.ORANGE;Di2015NewLine        ((Chunk)(hc.Phrase[0])).Font = new iTextSharp.text.Font(((Chunk)(hc.Phrase[0])).Font.Family, 5f);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        fc = new PdfPCell(new Phrase(footer));Di2015NewLine        hc.Top = 0f;Di2015NewLine        fc.FixedHeight = 7f;Di2015NewLine        hc.HorizontalAlignment = 1;Di2015NewLine        fc.BackgroundColor = iTextSharp.text.Color.YELLOW;Di2015NewLine        ((Chunk)(fc.Phrase[0])).Font = new iTextSharp.text.Font(((Chunk)(fc.Phrase[0])).Font.Family, 5f);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        pdft.AddCell(hc);Di2015NewLine        pdft.AddCell(text);Di2015NewLine        pdft.AddCell(fc);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return pdft;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void GeneratePDF()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Document document = new Document();Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {            Di2015NewLine            PdfWriter.GetInstance(document, new FileStream("File1.pdf", FileMode.Create));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            document.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            PdfPTable table = new PdfPTable(5);Di2015NewLine            table.DefaultCell.Padding = 0;Di2015NewLine            table.DefaultCell.BorderWidth = 2f;Di2015NewLine            for (int j = 1; j < 6; j++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (int i = 1; i < 6; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //calling GetHFCellDi2015NewLine                    table.AddCell(Di2015NewLine                        GetHFCell("header " + ((int)(i + 5 * (j - 1))).ToString(), Di2015NewLine                                  "footer " + ((int)(i + 5 * (j - 1))).ToString(), Di2015NewLine                                  "z" + j.ToString() + i.ToString()));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            document.Add(table);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (DocumentException de)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //...Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (IOException ioe)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //...Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        document.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

1516165Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Class for dynamic parallel invoking of a MulticastDelegate.Di2015NewLine/// (C) 2009 ArsÃ¨ne von Wyss, avw@gmx.chDi2015NewLine/// No warranties of any kind, use at your own risk. Copyright notice must be kept in the source when re-used.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic static class ParallelInvoke {Di2015NewLine\private class ParallelInvokeContext<TDelegate> where 1522439Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq.Expressions;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string[] arr = { "abc", "def" };Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < arr.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Foo(() => arr[i]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static object Foo<T>(Expression<Func<T>> lambda)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        object obj = Walk(lambda.Body);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Value is: " + obj);Di2015NewLine        return obj;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static object Walk(Expression expr)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        switch (expr.NodeType)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.ArrayIndex:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                BinaryExpression be = (BinaryExpression)expr;Di2015NewLine                Array arr = (Array)Walk(be.Left);Di2015NewLine                int index = (int) Walk(be.Right);Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Index is: " + index);Di2015NewLine                return arr.GetValue(index);Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.MemberAccess:Di2015NewLine                MemberExpression me = (MemberExpression)expr;Di2015NewLine                switch (me.Member.MemberType)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    case MemberTypes.Property:Di2015NewLine                        return ((PropertyInfo)me.Member).GetValue(Walk(me.Expression), null);Di2015NewLine                    case MemberTypes.Field:Di2015NewLine                        return ((FieldInfo)me.Member).GetValue(Walk(me.Expression));Di2015NewLine                    default:Di2015NewLine                        throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.Constant:Di2015NewLine                return ((ConstantExpression) expr).Value;Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1527745Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic bool SubmitBugToBugTracker(string serverName,Di2015NewLine                                        bool useProxy,Di2015NewLine                                        string proxyHost,Di2015NewLine                                        int proxyPort,Di2015NewLine                                        string userName,Di2015NewLine                                        string password,Di2015NewLine                                        string description,Di2015NewLine                                        string comment,Di2015NewLine                                        int projectId)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!serverName.EndsWith(@"/"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            serverName += @"/";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        string requestUrl = serverName + "insert_bug.aspx";Di2015NewLine        string requestMethod = "POST";Di2015NewLine        string requestContentType = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded";Di2015NewLine        string requestParameters = "username=" + userNameDi2015NewLine                                  + "&password=" + passwordDi2015NewLine                                  + "&short_desc=" + descriptionDi2015NewLine                                  + "&comment=" + commentDi2015NewLine                                  + "&projectid=" + projectId;Di2015NewLine        // POST parameters (postvars)Di2015NewLine        byte[] buffer = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(requestParameters);Di2015NewLine        // InitialisationDi2015NewLine        HttpWebRequest WebReq = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(requestUrl);Di2015NewLine        // Add proxy info if used.Di2015NewLine        if (useProxy)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            WebReq.Proxy = new WebProxy(proxyHost, proxyPort);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Method is POSTDi2015NewLine        WebReq.Method = requestMethod;Di2015NewLine        // ContentType, for the postvars.Di2015NewLine        WebReq.ContentType = requestContentType;Di2015NewLine        // Length of the buffer (postvars) is used as contentlength.Di2015NewLine        WebReq.ContentLength = buffer.Length;Di2015NewLine        // Open a stream for writing the postvarsDi2015NewLine        Stream PostData = WebReq.GetRequestStream();Di2015NewLine        //Now we write, and afterwards, we close. Closing is always important!Di2015NewLine        PostData.Write(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine        PostData.Close();Di2015NewLine        // Get the response handle, we have no true response yet!Di2015NewLine        HttpWebResponse WebResp = (HttpWebResponse)WebReq.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine        // Read the response (the string)Di2015NewLine        Stream Answer = WebResp.GetResponseStream();Di2015NewLine        StreamReader _Answer = new StreamReader(Answer);Di2015NewLine        string responseStream = _Answer.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Find out if bug submission was successfull.Di2015NewLine        if (responseStream.StartsWith("OK:"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MessageBox.Show("Bug submitted successfully.");Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (responseStream.StartsWith("ERROR:"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MessageBox.Show("Error occured. Bug hasn't been submitted.\\nError Message: " + responseStream);Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MessageBox.Show("Error occured. Bug hasn't been submitted.\\nError Message: " + responseStream);Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

1528372Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<string> list = new List<string>();Di2015NewLinelist.Sort((x, y) =>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if(Char.IsLetterOrDigit(x[0])){Di2015NewLine        if(!Char.IsLetterOrDigit(y[0])){Di2015NewLine            // x is a letter/digit and y is not, override regular CompareToDi2015NewLine            return -1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (Char.IsLetterOrDigit(y[0]))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // y is a letter/digit and x is not, override regular CompareToDi2015NewLine        return 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return x.CompareTo(y);Di2015NewLine});Di2015NewLine

1528886Di2015UniqueSeparatorDi2015NewLine    public static long Decompress(Stream inp, Stream outp)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    \byte[]  buf = new byte[BUF_SIZE];Di2015NewLine    \long    nBytes = 0;  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    \// Decompress the contents of the input fileDi2015NewLine    \using (inp = new DeflateStream(inp, CompressionMode.Decompress))Di2015NewLine    \{Di2015NewLine    \\int len;Di2015NewLine    \\while ((len = inp.Read(buf, 0, buf.Length)) > 0)Di2015NewLine    \\{Di2015NewLine    \\\// Write the data block to the decompressed output streamDi2015NewLine    \\\outp.Write(buf, 0, len);Di2015NewLine    \\\nBytes += len;Di2015NewLine    \\}  Di2015NewLine    \}Di2015NewLine    \// DoneDi2015NewLine    \return nBytes;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
