1529088Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void GenerateThumbNail(HttpPostedFile fil, string sPhysicalPath, Di2015NewLine                              string sOrgFileName,string sThumbNailFileName,Di2015NewLine                              ImageFormat oFormat, int rez)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        System.Drawing.Image oImg = System.Drawing.Image.FromStream(fil.InputStream);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        decimal pixtosubstract = 0;Di2015NewLine        decimal percentage;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //defaultDi2015NewLine        Size ThumbNailSizeToUse = new Size();Di2015NewLine        if (ThumbNailSize.Width < oImg.Size.Width || ThumbNailSize.Height < oImg.Size.Height)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (oImg.Size.Width > oImg.Size.Height)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                percentage = (((decimal)oImg.Size.Width - (decimal)ThumbNailSize.Width) / (decimal)oImg.Size.Width);Di2015NewLine                pixtosubstract = percentage * oImg.Size.Height;Di2015NewLine                ThumbNailSizeToUse.Width = ThumbNailSize.Width;Di2015NewLine                ThumbNailSizeToUse.Height = oImg.Size.Height - (int)pixtosubstract;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                percentage = (((decimal)oImg.Size.Height - (decimal)ThumbNailSize.Height) / (decimal)oImg.Size.Height);Di2015NewLine                pixtosubstract = percentage * (decimal)oImg.Size.Width;Di2015NewLine                ThumbNailSizeToUse.Height = ThumbNailSize.Height;Di2015NewLine                ThumbNailSizeToUse.Width = oImg.Size.Width - (int)pixtosubstract;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ThumbNailSizeToUse.Width = oImg.Size.Width;Di2015NewLine            ThumbNailSizeToUse.Height = oImg.Size.Height;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(ThumbNailSizeToUse.Width, ThumbNailSizeToUse.Height);Di2015NewLine        bmp.SetResolution(rez, rez);Di2015NewLine        System.Drawing.Image oThumbNail = bmp;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bmp = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Graphics oGraphic = Graphics.FromImage(oThumbNail);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        oGraphic.CompositingQuality = CompositingQuality.HighQuality;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        oGraphic.SmoothingMode = SmoothingMode.HighQuality;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        oGraphic.InterpolationMode = InterpolationMode.HighQualityBicubic;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Rectangle oRectangle = new Rectangle(0, 0, ThumbNailSizeToUse.Width, ThumbNailSizeToUse.Height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        oGraphic.DrawImage(oImg, oRectangle);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        oThumbNail.Save(sPhysicalPath  + sThumbNailFileName, oFormat);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        oImg.Dispose();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Response.Write(ex.Message);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1531756Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass TestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static List<int> ints = Enumerable.Range(0, 10000000).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Benchmark("All", i => i >= 0); // Match allDi2015NewLine        Benchmark("Half", i => i % 2 == 0); // Match halfDi2015NewLine        Benchmark("None", i => i < 0); // Match noneDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Benchmark(string name, Predicate<int> predicate)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // We could just use new Func<int, bool>(predicate) but thatDi2015NewLine        // would create one delegate wrapping another.Di2015NewLine        Func<int, bool> func = (Func<int, bool>) Di2015NewLine            Delegate.CreateDelegate(typeof(Func<int, bool>), predicate.Target,Di2015NewLine                                    predicate.Method);Di2015NewLine        Benchmark("FindAll: " + name, () => ints.FindAll(predicate));Di2015NewLine        Benchmark("Where: " + name, () => ints.Where(func).Count());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Benchmark(string name, Action action)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        GC.Collect();Di2015NewLine        Stopwatch sw = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < 50; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            action();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        sw.Stop();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0}: {1}", name, sw.ElapsedMilliseconds);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1532299Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void ChangeLinks(ref HtmlDocument doc)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (doc == null) return;Di2015NewLine            //process all tage with link referencesDi2015NewLine            HtmlNodeCollection links = doc.DocumentNode.SelectNodes("//*[@background or @lowsrc or @src or @href]");Di2015NewLine            if (links == null)Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (HtmlNode link in links)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (link.Attributes["background"] != null)Di2015NewLine                    link.Attributes["background"].Value = _newPath + link.Attributes["background"].Value;Di2015NewLine                if (link.Attributes["href"] != null)Di2015NewLine                    link.Attributes["href"].Value = _newPath + link.Attributes["href"].Value;(link.Attributes["href"] != null)Di2015NewLine                    link.Attributes["lowsrc"].Value = _newPath + link.Attributes["href"].Value;Di2015NewLine                if (link.Attributes["src"] != null)Di2015NewLine                    link.Attributes["src"].Value = _newPath + link.Attributes["src"].Value;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

1533459Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void SvnOutputHandler(object sendingProcess,Di2015NewLine                                      DataReceivedEventArgs outLine)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Process p = sendingProcess as Process;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Save the output lines hereDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void RunSVNCommand()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ProcessStartInfo psi = new ProcessStartInfo("svn.exe",Di2015NewLine                                                string.Format("update \\"{0}\\" {1}", parm1, parm2));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    psi.UseShellExecute = false;Di2015NewLine    psi.CreateNoWindow = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Redirect the standard output of the sort command. 1535437Di2015UniqueSeparatornamespace SwizzleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// This implements the Vector4 class as described in the question, based on our totally    v2 = v1.rgb;Di2015NewLine            // Prints: v2.r: 2Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("v2.r: {0}", v2.r);Di2015NewLine            // Prints: red: 2Di2015NewLine            int red = v2.r;Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("red: {0}", red);Di2015NewLine            // Prints: v2 has 3 elements.Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("v2 has {0} elements.", v2.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            v3 = new Vector4(5, 6, 7, 8);Di2015NewLine            v3.ar = v2.gb; // yes, the names are preserved! v3 = (3, 4, 7, 8)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            v2.r = 5;Di2015NewLine            //v2.a = 5; // fails: v2 has no 'a' element, only 'r', 'g', and 'b'Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Something fun that will also workDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("v3.gr: {0}", v3.gr);Di2015NewLine            v3.rg = v3.gr; // switch green and redDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("v3.gr: {0}", v3.gr);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("\\r\\nPress any key to continue.");Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadKey(true);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class Vector<T> : DynamicObjectDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private T[] m_values;Di2015NewLine        private Dictionary<char, int> m_positions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Vector(Dictionary<char, int> positions, params T[] values)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.m_positions = positions;Di2015NewLine            this.m_values = values;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public T this[int index] {Di2015NewLine            get { return this.m_values[index]; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int LengthDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return this.m_values.Length; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            List<string> elements = new List<string>(this.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < this.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                elements.Add(m_values[i].ToString());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return string.Join(", ", elements.ToArray());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override bool TryGetMember(GetMemberBinder binder, out object result)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (binder.Name == "Length") {Di2015NewLine                result = this.Length;Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (binder.Name.Length == 1 && this.m_positions.ContainsKey(binder.Name[0]))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                result = m_values[this.m_positions[binder.Name[0]]];Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Dictionary<char, int> positions = new Dictionary<char, int>(binder.Name.Length);Di2015NewLine            List<T> values = new List<T>(binder.Name.Length);Di2015NewLine            int i = 0;Di2015NewLine            foreach (char c in binder.Name)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!this.m_positions.ContainsKey(c))Di2015NewLine                    return base.TryGetMember(binder, out result);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                values.Add(m_values[m_positions[c]]);Di2015NewLine                positions.Add(c, i);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                i++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            result = new Vector<T>(positions, values.ToArray());Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override bool TrySetMember(SetMemberBinder binder, object value)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // sanity checking.Di2015NewLine            foreach (char c in binder.Name)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!this.m_positions.ContainsKey(c))Di2015NewLine                    return base.TrySetMember(binder, value);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Vector<T> vectorValue = value as Vector<T>;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (vectorValue == null && binder.Name.Length == 1 && value is T)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                m_values[m_positions[binder.Name[0]]] = (T)value;Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (vectorValue == null)Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentException("You may only set properties of a Vector to another Vector of the same type.");Di2015NewLine            if (vectorValue.Length != binder.Name.Length)Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("The length of the Vector given does not match the length of the Vector to assign it to.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int i = 0;Di2015NewLine            foreach (char c in binder.Name)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                m_values[m_positions[c]] = vectorValue[i];Di2015NewLine                i++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1535612Di2015UniqueSeparatorSub fillInteriorMulti(rg As Range, Arr() As Long)Di2015NewLine    Dim N As Long, Ndx1 As Long, Ndx2 As LongDi2015NewLine    Dim icol As LongDi2015NewLine    Dim irow As LongDi2015NewLine    Dim NumDims As LongDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Custom Function: Get the number of array dimensions.Di2015NewLine    // NumberOfArrayDimensions will return 0Di2015NewLine    // if the array is not allocated.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    NumDims = NumberOfArrayDimensions(Arr:=Arr)Di2015NewLine    Select Case NumDimsDi2015NewLine        Case 0Di2015NewLine            // unallocated arrayDi2015NewLine            Exit SubDi2015NewLine        Case 1Di2015NewLine            // single dimensional arrayDi2015NewLine            For N = LBound(Arr) To UBound(Arr)Di2015NewLine                With rg(N, 1).InteriorDi2015NewLine                    .ColorIndex = Arr(N)Di2015NewLine                    .PatternColorIndex = xlAutomaticDi2015NewLine                    .PatternColor = xlSolidDi2015NewLine                End WithDi2015NewLine            Next NDi2015NewLine        Case 2Di2015NewLine            // 2 dimensional arrayDi2015NewLine            For Ndx1 = LBound(Arr, 1) To UBound(Arr, 1)Di2015NewLine                For Ndx2 = LBound(Arr, 2) To UBound(Arr, 2)Di2015NewLine                    With rg(Ndx1, Ndx2).InteriorDi2015NewLine                        .ColorIndex = Arr(Ndx1, Ndx2)Di2015NewLine                        .PatternColorIndex = xlAutomaticDi2015NewLine                        .PatternColor = xlSolidDi2015NewLine                    End WithDi2015NewLine                Next Ndx2Di2015NewLine            Next Ndx1Di2015NewLine        Case ElseDi2015NewLine            // Too many dimensions - Do NothingDi2015NewLine    End SelectDi2015NewLineEnd SubDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePublic Function NumberOfArrayDimensions(Arr As Variant) As IntegerDi2015NewLine    // NumberOfArrayDimensionsDi2015NewLine    // This function returns the number of dimensions of an array. An unallocated dynamic arrayDi2015NewLine    // has 0 dimensions. This condition can also be tested with IsArrayEmpty.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Dim Ndx As IntegerDi2015NewLine    Dim Res As IntegerDi2015NewLine    On Error Resume NextDi2015NewLine    // Loop, increasing the dimension index Ndx, until an error occurs.Di2015NewLine    // An error will occur when Ndx exceeds the number of dimensionDi2015NewLine    // in the array. Return Ndx - 1.Di2015NewLine    DoDi2015NewLine        Ndx = Ndx + 1Di2015NewLine        Res = UBound(Arr, Ndx)Di2015NewLine    Loop Until Err.Number <> 0Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    NumberOfArrayDimensions = Ndx - 1Di2015NewLineEnd FunctionDi2015NewLine

j;Di2015NewLine        Action save = () => Console.WriteLine("{0} has been saved", ao.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        switch (idCode)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case "add":Di2015NewLine                ao.LoadAlgorithm(idCode, add);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case "subtract":Di2015NewLine                ao.LoadAlgorithm(idCode, subtract);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case "save":Di2015NewLine                ao.LoadAlgorithm(idCode, save);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static ObjectFactory InstanceDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (singleton == null)Di2015NewLine                singleton = new ObjectFactory();Di2015NewLine            return singleton;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic abstract class AdornedObjectDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Dictionary<string, Delegate> algorithms = new Dictionary<string, Delegate>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void LoadAlgorithm(string idCode, Delegate func)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        algorithms.Add(idCode, func);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object CallAlgorithm(string idCode, params object[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Delegate func = algorithms[idCode];Di2015NewLine        return func.DynamicInvoke(args);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var completedEvent = new ManualResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // copy as usual but listen for completionDi2015NewLine        var copier = new AsyncStreamCopier(net, file);Di2015NewLine        copier.Completed += (s, e) => completedEvent.Set();Di2015NewLine        copier.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public class AsyncStreamCopierDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public event EventHandler Completed;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private readonly Stream     {Di2015NewLine                RaiseCompleted();Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // write synchronouslyDi2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

Start()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock (m_SyncRoot)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (m_Capturer != null)Di2015NewLine                    throw new ApplicationException("This DebugMonitor is already started.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (Environment.OSVersion.ToString().IndexOf("Microsoft") == -1)Di2015NewLine                    throw new NotSupportedException("This DebugMonitor is only supported on Microsoft operating systems.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                bool createdNew = false;Di2015NewLine                m_Mutex = new Mutex(false, typeof(DebugMonitor).Namespace, out createdNew);Di2015NewLine                if (!createdNew)Di2015NewLine                    throw new ApplicationException("There is already an instance of 'DbMon.NET' running.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                SECURITY_DESCRIPTOR sd = new SECURITY_DESCRIPTOR();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (!InitializeSecurityDescriptor(ref sd, SECURITY_DESCRIPTOR_REVISION))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw CreateApplicationException("Failed to initializes the security descriptor.");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (!SetSecurityDescriptorDacl(ref sd, true, IntPtr.Zero, false))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw CreateApplicationException("Failed to initializes the security descriptor");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                SECURITY_ATTRIBUTES sa = new SECURITY_ATTRIBUTES();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                m_AckEvent = CreateEvent(ref sa, false, false, "DBWIN_BUFFER_READY");Di2015NewLine                if (m_AckEvent == IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw CreateApplicationException("Failed to create event 'DBWIN_BUFFER_READY'");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                m_ReadyEvent = CreateEvent(ref sa, false, false, "DBWIN_DATA_READY");Di2015NewLine                if (m_ReadyEvent == IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw CreateApplicationException("Failed to create event 'DBWIN_DATA_READY'");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                m_SharedFile = CreateFileMapping(new IntPtr(-1), ref sa, PageProtection.ReadWrite, 0, 4096, "DBWIN_BUFFER");Di2015NewLine                if (m_SharedFile == IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw CreateApplicationException("Failed to create a file mapping to slot 'DBWIN_BUFFER'");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                m_SharedMem = MapViewOfFile(m_SharedFile, SECTION_MAP_READ, 0, 0, 512);Di2015NewLine                if (m_SharedMem == IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw CreateApplicationException("Failed to create a mapping view for slot 'DBWIN_BUFFER'");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                m_Capturer = new Thread(new ThreadStart(Capture));Di2015NewLine                m_Capturer.Start();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void Capture()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                IntPtr pString = new IntPtr(Di2015NewLine                    m_SharedMem.ToInt32() + Marshal.SizeOf(typeof(int))Di2015NewLine                );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                while (true)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine null)Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (ret == WAIT_OBJECT_0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        FireOnOutputDebugString(Di2015NewLine                            Marshal.ReadInt32(m_SharedMem),Di2015NewLine                                Marshal.PtrToStringAnsi(pString));Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catchDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Dispose();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void FireOnOutputDebugString(int pid, string text)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (OnOutputDebugString == null)Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#if }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("An 'OnOutputDebugString' handler failed to execute: " + ex.ToString());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine#endifDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void Dispose()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (m_AckEvent != IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!CloseHandle(m_AckEvent))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw CreateApplicationException("Failed to close handle for 'AckEvent'");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                m_AckEvent = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (m_ReadyEvent != IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!CloseHandle(m_ReadyEvent))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw CreateApplicationException("Failed to close handle for 'ReadyEvent'");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                m_ReadyEvent = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (m_SharedFile != IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!CloseHandle(m_SharedFile))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw CreateApplicationException("Failed to close handle for 'SharedFile'");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                m_SharedFile = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (m_SharedMem != IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if    }Di2015NewLine                m_SharedMem = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (m_Mutex != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine ObjectDisposedException("DebugMonitor", "This DebugMonitor is not running.");Di2015NewLine                m_Capturer = null;Di2015NewLine                PulseEvent(m_ReadyEvent);Di2015NewLine                while (m_AckEvent != IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine                    ;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static ApplicationException may not be empty or null.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return new ApplicationException(string.Format("{0}. {Di2015NewLine\\Debug.WriteLine("Found scientific format: {0} => [{1}] [{2}] [{3}] [{4}]", result, match.Groups["sign"], match.Groups["head"], match.Groups["tail"], match.Groups["exponent"]);Di2015NewLine\\int exponent = int.Parse(match.Groups["exponent"].Value, NumberStyles.Integer, NumberFormatInfo.InvariantInfo);Di2015NewLine\\StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder(result.Length+Math.Abs(exponent));Di2015NewLine\\builder.Append(match.Groups["sign"].Value);Di2015NewLine\\if (exponent >= 0) {Di2015NewLine\\\builder.Append(match.Groups["head"].Value);Di2015NewLine\\\string tail = match.Groups["tail"].Value;Di2015NewLine\\\if (exponent < tail.Length) {Di2015NewLine\\\\builder.Append(tail, 1547961Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static TimeSpan GetTimeSpanFormString(string strString)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    strString = strString.Trim();Di2015NewLine    string[] strParts = strString.Split(':', ' ');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int intHours, intMinutes;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (strParts.Length != 3)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("The string is not a valid timespan");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    intHours = strParts[2].ToUpper() == "PM" ? Convert.ToInt32(strParts[0]) + 12 : Convert.ToInt32(strParts[0]);Di2015NewLine    intMinutes = Convert.ToInt32(strParts[1]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return new TimeSpan(intHours, intMinutes, 0);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1548120Di2015UniqueSeparatorMain
1548122Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass Record : IPEndPoint, IComparable<Record>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    internal long Offset { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public bool Deleted  { get; internal set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Record() : base(0, 0)Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        Offset = -1;Di2015NewLine        Deleted = false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int CompareTo(Record other)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (this.Address == other.Address && this.Address == other.Address )Di2015NewLine            return 0;Di2015NewLine        else if (this.Address == other.Address)Di2015NewLine            return this.Port.CompareTo(other.Port);Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            return Di2015NewLine              BitConverter.ToInt32(this.Address.GetAddressBytes(), 0).CompareTo(Di2015NewLine              BitConverter.ToInt32(other.Address.GetAddressBytes(), 0));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass RecordComparer : IComparer<Record>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int Compare(Record x, Record y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return x.CompareTo(y);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1548122Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass DatabaseFile : IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private FileStream file;Di2015NewLine    private static int RecordSize = 7;Di2015NewLine    private static byte[] Deleted = new byte[] { 42 };Di2015NewLine    private static byte[] Undeleted = new byte[] { 32 };Di2015NewLine    public DatabaseFile(string filename)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        file = new FileStream(filename, Di2015NewLine            FileMode.OpenOrCreate, FileAccess.ReadWrite, FileShare.None);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<Record> Locate(Predicate<Record> record)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        file.Seek(0, SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLine        while (file.Position < file.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            long offset = file.Position;Di2015NewLine            byte[] buffer = new byte[DatabaseFile.RecordSize];Di2015NewLine            file.Read(buffer, 0, DatabaseFile.RecordSize);Di2015NewLine            Record current = Build(offset, buffer);Di2015NewLine            if (record.Invoke(current))Di2015NewLine                yield return current;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Append(Record record)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // should I look for duplicated values? i dunnoDi2015NewLine        file.Seek(0, SeekOrigin.End);Di2015NewLine        record.Deleted = false;Di2015NewLine        record.Offset = file.Position;Di2015NewLine        Write(record);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Delete(Record record)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (record.Offset == -1) return;Di2015NewLine        file.Seek(record.Offset, SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLine        record.Deleted = true;Di2015NewLine        Write(record);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Update(Record record)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (record.Offset == -1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Append(record);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            file.Seek(record.Offset, SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLine            Write(record);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Write(Record record)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        file.Write(GetBytes(record), 0, DatabaseFile.RecordSize);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Record Build(long offset, byte[] data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] ipAddress = new byte[4];Di2015NewLine        Array.Copy(data, 1, ipAddress, 0, ipAddress.Length);Di2015NewLine        return new RecordDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Offset = offset,Di2015NewLine            Deleted = (data[0] == DatabaseFile.Deleted[0]),Di2015NewLine            Address = new IPAddress(ipAddress), Di2015NewLine            Port = BitConverter.ToInt16(data, 5)Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private byte[] GetBytes(Record record)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] returnValue = new byte[DatabaseFile.RecordSize];Di2015NewLine        Array.Copy(Di2015NewLine            record.Deleted ? DatabaseFile.Deleted : DatabaseFile.Undeleted, 0, Di2015NewLine            returnValue, 0, 1);Di2015NewLine        Array.Copy(record.Address.GetAddressBytes(), 0, Di2015NewLine            returnValue, 1, 4);Di2015NewLine        Array.Copy(BitConverter.GetBytes(record.Port), 0, Di2015NewLine            returnValue, 5, 2);Di2015NewLine        return returnValue;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Pack()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        long freeBytes = 0;Di2015NewLine        byte[] buffer = new byte[RecordSize];Di2015NewLine        Queue<long> deletes = new Queue<long>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        file.Seek(0, SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLine        while (file.Position < file.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            long offset = file.Position;Di2015NewLine            file.Read(buffer, 0, RecordSize);Di2015NewLine            if (buffer[0] == Deleted[0])Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                deletes.Enqueue(offset);Di2015NewLine                freeBytes += RecordSize;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (deletes.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    deletes.Enqueue(offset);Di2015NewLine                    file.Seek(deletes.Dequeue(), SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLine                    file.Write(buffer, 0, RecordSize);Di2015NewLine                    file.Seek(offset + RecordSize, SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        file.SetLength(file.Length - freeBytes);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Sort()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int offset = -RecordSize; // lazy methodDi2015NewLine        List<Record> records = this.Locate(r => true).ToList();Di2015NewLine        records.Sort(new RecordComparer());Di2015NewLine        foreach (Record record in records)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            record.Offset = offset += RecordSize;Di2015NewLine            Update(record);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (file != null)Di2015NewLine            file.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1548122Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<IPEndPoint> endPoints = new List<IPEndPoint>(Di2015NewLine        new IPEndPoint[]{Di2015NewLine            new IPEndPoint(IPAddress.Parse("127.0.0.1"), 80),Di2015NewLine            new IPEndPoint(IPAddress.Parse("69.59.196.211"), 80),Di2015NewLine            new IPEndPoint(IPAddress.Parse("74.125.45.100"), 80)Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine    using (DatabaseFile dbf = new DatabaseFile("iptable.txt"))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (IPEndPoint endPoint in endPoints)Di2015NewLine            dbf.Append(new Record { Di2015NewLine                Address = endPoint.Address, Di2015NewLine                Port = endPoint.Port });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Record stackOverflow = dbf.Locate(r => Di2015NewLine            Dns.GetHostEntry(r.Address)Di2015NewLine                .HostName.Equals("stackoverflow.com")).FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine        if (stackOverflow != null)Di2015NewLine            dbf.Delete(stackOverflow);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Record google = dbf.Locate(r =>Di2015NewLine            r.Address.ToString() == "74.125.45.100").First();Di2015NewLine        google.Port = 443;Di2015NewLine        dbf.Update(google);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach(Record http in dbf.Locate(r => Di2015NewLine            !r.Deleted && r.Port == 80))Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(http.ToString());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

<WithCompany>Amazon</WithCompany>Di2015NewLine// </Account>Di2015NewLine// <Person i:type=""PersonBilingual"">Di2015NewLine//  <FullName>Jane Doe</FullName>Di2015NewLine// Quickwatch...");Di2015NewLine   Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine [XmlRoot(ElementName = "ItemList", IsNullable = false)]Di2015NewLine [XmlInclude(typeof(Person))]Di2015NewLine [XmlInclude(typeof(PersonBilingual))]Di2015NewLine [XmlInclude(typeof(Account))]Di2015NewLine [XmlInclude(typeof(AccountBank))]Di2015NewLine public class ItemList<T> : IXmlSerializable {Di2015NewLine  #region Private varsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  /// <summary>Di2015NewLine  /// The class that will store our serializers for the various classes that may be (de)serialized, givenDi2015NewLine  /// the type of this ItemList (ie. the type itself, as well as any type that extends the type)Di2015NewLine  /// </summary>Di2015NewLine  private class Map : Dictionary<string, XmlSerializer> { public Map() : base(StringComparer.Ordinal) { } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  #region Private methodsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  /// <summary>Di2015NewLine  /// Creates a 'schema' for this ItemList, using its type, and the XmlIncludeAttribute types that areDi2015NewLine  /// associated with it.  For each XmlIncludeAttribute, if it can be assigned to this ItemList's type (soDi2015NewLine  /// it's either the same type as this ItemList's type or a type that extends this ItemList's type), addsDi2015NewLine  /// the XmlSerializer for that XmlIncludeAttribute's type to our 'schema' collection, allowing a nodeDi2015NewLine  /// corresponding to that type to be (de)serialized by this ItemList.Di2015NewLine  /// </summary>Di2015NewLine  /// <returns>The 'schema' containing the XmlSerializer's available for this ItemList to use during (de)serialization.</returns>Di2015NewLine  private Map loadSchema() {Di2015NewLine   Map map = new Map();Di2015NewLine   foreach (XmlIncludeAttribute inc in typeof(ItemList<T>).GetCustomAttributes(typeof(XmlIncludeAttribute), true)) {Di2015NewLine    Type t = inc.Type;Di2015NewLine    if (typeof(T).IsAssignableFrom(t)) { map.Add(xmlTypeName(t), new XmlSerializer(t)); }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   return map;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  /// <summary>Di2015NewLine  /// As the XML type name can be different to our internal class name for that XML type, we need to be ableDi2015NewLine  /// to expect an XML element name that is different to our internal class name for that XML type.  Hence,Di2015NewLine  /// our 'schema' map will contain XmlSerializer's whose keys are based on the XML type name, NOT ourDi2015NewLine  /// internal class name for that XML type.  This method returns the XML type name given our internalDi2015NewLine  /// class we're using to (de)serialize that XML type.  If no XML TypeName is specified in our internalDi2015NewLine  /// class's XmlTypeAttribute, we assume an XML type name identical to the internal class name.Di2015NewLine  /// </summary>Di2015NewLine  /// <param name="t">Our internal class used to (de)serialize an XML type.</param>Di2015NewLine  /// <returns>The XML type name corresponding to the given internal class.</returns>Di2015NewLine  private string xmlTypeName(Type t) {Di2015NewLine   string typeName = t.Name;Di2015NewLine   foreach (XmlTypeAttribute ta in t.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(XmlTypeAttribute), true)) {Di2015NewLine    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(ta.TypeName)) { typeName = ta.TypeName; }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   return typeName;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  #region IXmlSerializable MembersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  /// <summary>Di2015NewLine  /// Reserved and should not be used.Di2015NewLine  /// </summary>Di2015NewLine  /// <returns>Must return null.</returns>Di2015NewLine  public XmlSchema GetSchema() {Di2015NewLine   return null;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  /// <summary>Di2015NewLine  /// Generates a list of type T objects from their XML representation; stores them in this.Items.Di2015NewLine  /// </summary>Di2015NewLine  /// <param name="reader">The System.Xml.XmlReader stream from which the objects are deserialized.</param>Di2015NewLine  public void ReadXml(XmlReader reader) {Di2015NewLine   Map map = loadSchema();Di2015NewLine   int depth = reader.Depth;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   List<T> items = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine   if (!reader.IsEmptyElement && reader.Read()) {Di2015NewLine    // While the reader is at a greater depth that the initial depth, ie. at one of the elementsDi2015NewLine    // inside the list wrapper, the initial depth being that of the list wrapper <ItemList>...Di2015NewLine    while (reader.Depth > depth) {Di2015NewLine     try { items.Add((T)map[reader.LocalName].Deserialize(reader)); }Di2015NewLine     catch (InvalidOperationException iopEx) {Di2015NewLine      if (Di2015NewLine       iopEx.InnerException != null &&Di2015NewLine       iopEx.InnerException.Message.StartsWith("The specified type was not recognized")Di2015NewLine      ) { throw new InvalidOperationException("Couldn't deserialize node '" + reader.LocalName + "' because although its element node is a valid type, its attribute-specified type was not recognized.  Perhaps it needs adding to the ItemList using XmlIncludeAttribute?", iopEx); }Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine     catch (KeyNotFoundException knfEx) {Di2015NewLine      throw new InvalidOperationException("Couldn't deserialize node '" + reader.LocalName + "' because its element node was not recognized as a valid type.  Perhaps it needs adding to the ItemList using XmlIncludeAttribute?", knfEx);Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine     catch (Exception ex) {Di2015NewLine      throw ex;Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   this.Items = items;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  /// <summary>Di2015NewLine  /// Converts a list of type T objects into their XML representation; writes them to the specified writer.Di2015NewLine  /// </summary>Di2015NewLine  /// <param name="writer">The System.Xml.XmlWriter stream to which the objects are serialized.</param>Di2015NewLine  public void WriteXml(XmlWriter writer) {Di2015NewLine   Map map = loadSchema();Di2015NewLine   foreach (T item in this.Items) {Di2015NewLine    map[xmlTypeName(item.GetType())].Serialize(writer, item);Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  #region Public propertiesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public List<T> Items { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  #endregionDi2015NewLine }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine /// <summary>Di2015NewLine /// A regular person.Di2015NewLine /// </summary>Di2015NewLine [XmlType(AnonymousType = false, TypeName = "Person", Namespace = "")]Di2015NewLine [XmlInclude(typeof(PersonBilingual))]Di2015NewLine public class Person {Di2015NewLine  public string FullName { get; set; }Di2015NewLine  public int Age { get; set; }Di2015NewLine  public string Language { get; set; }Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine /// <summary>Di2015NewLine /// A person who can speak a second language.Di2015NewLine /// </summary>Di2015NewLine [XmlType(AnonymousType = false, TypeName = "PersonBilingual", Namespace = "")]Di2015NewLine public class PersonBilingual : Person {Di2015NewLine  public string SecondLanguage { get; set; }Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine /// <summary>Di2015NewLine /// Some kind of account.Di2015NewLine /// </summary>Di2015NewLine [XmlType(AnonymousType = false, TypeName = "Account", Namespace = "")]Di2015NewLine [XmlInclude(typeof(AccountBank))]Di2015NewLine public class Account {Di2015NewLine  public string AcctName { get; 1550865Di2015UniqueSeparatorSystem.IO.FileStream fs = Di2015NewLine    new System.IO.FileStream(@"c:\\sample.wav", Di2015NewLine    System.IO.FileMode.Append);Di2015NewLineSystem.IO.BinaryWriter bw = new System.IO.BinaryWriter(fs);Di2015NewLinechar[] cue = new char[] { 'c', 'u', 'e', ' ' };Di2015NewLinebw.Write(cue, 0, 4); // "cue "Di2015NewLinebw.Write((int)28); // chunk size = 4 + (24 * # of cues)Di2015NewLinebw.Write((int)1); // # of cuesDi2015NewLine// first cue pointDi2015NewLinebw.Write((int)0); // unique ID of first cueDi2015NewLinebw.Write((int)0); // positionDi2015NewLinechar[] data = new char[] { 'd', 'a', 't', 'a' };Di2015NewLinebw.Write(data, 0, 4); // RIFF ID = "data"Di2015NewLinebw.Write((int)0); // chunk startDi2015NewLinebw.Write((int)0); // block startDi2015NewLinebw.Write((int)500); // sample offset - in a mono, 16-bits-per-sample WAVDi2015NewLine// file, this would be the 250th sample from the start of the blockDi2015NewLinebw.Close();Di2015NewLinefs.Dispose();Di2015NewLine

1553042Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static string Repeat(this string instance, int times)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (times == 1 || string.IsNullOrEmpty(instance)) return instance;Di2015NewLine        if (times == 0) return "";Di2015NewLine        if (times < 0) throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("times");Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(instance.Length * times);Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < times; i++)Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(instance);Di2015NewLine        return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

1556355Di2015UniqueSeparatorIL_0000:  ldc.i4.1  // load constant 1 on evaluation stackDi2015NewLineIL_0001:  stloc.0   // pop and store value in local 0Di2015NewLineIL_0002:  ldloc.0   // load value of local 0 on evaluation stackDi2015NewLineIL_0003:  ldloc.0   // repeat, stack is now 1, 1Di2015NewLineIL_0004:  dup       // duplicate topmost value on evaluation stack, Di2015NewLine                    // i.e. stack is now 1, 1, 1Di2015NewLineIL_0005:  ldc.i4.1  // load constant 1 on evaluation stackDi2015NewLineIL_0006:  add       // add two topmost values on stack, Di2015NewLine                    // i.e. 1 and 1 and push result on stackDi2015NewLineIL_0007:  stloc.0   // pop and store this value in local 0Di2015NewLineIL_0008:  add       // add the two remaining values on the stackDi2015NewLine                    // which again happens to be 1 and 1 and push result to stackDi2015NewLineIL_0009:  stloc.0   // pop and store this value in local 0Di2015NewLine

1560264Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic sealed class RndGeneratorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static int m_rndSeed = 0x50000;Di2015NewLine    // This is the value that the programmer sets the seed at ProjectData objectDi2015NewLine    // initializationDi2015NewLine    const int CONSTANT_INIT_RNDSEED = 0x50000; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // MethodsDi2015NewLine    private static float GetTimer()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DateTime now = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine        return (float)(((((60 * now.Hour) + now.Minute) * 60) + now.Second) + (((double)now.Millisecond) / 1000.0));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Randomize()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        float timer = GetTimer();Di2015NewLine        int rndSeed = m_rndSeed;Di2015NewLine        int num = BitConverter.ToInt32(BitConverter.GetBytes(timer), 0);Di2015NewLine        num = ((num & 0xffff) ^ (num >> 0x10)) << 8;Di2015NewLine        rndSeed = (rndSeed & -16776961) | num;Di2015NewLine        m_rndSeed = rndSeed;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Randomize(double Number)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Randomize(Number, false);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Randomize(double Number, bool useHardCodedState)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int num;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int rndSeed = 0;Di2015NewLine        if (useHardCodedState)Di2015NewLine            rndSeed = CONSTANT_INIT_RNDSEED;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            rndSeed = m_rndSeed;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (BitConverter.IsLittleEndian)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            num = BitConverter.ToInt32(BitConverter.GetBytes(Number), 4);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            num = BitConverter.ToInt32(BitConverter.GetBytes(Number), 0);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        num = ((num & 0xffff) ^ (num >> 0x10)) << 8;Di2015NewLine        rndSeed = (rndSeed & -16776961) | num;Di2015NewLine        m_rndSeed = rndSeed;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static float Rnd()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Rnd(1f);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static float Rnd(float Number)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int rndSeed = m_rndSeed;Di2015NewLine        if (Number != 0.0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (Number < 0.0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                long num3 = BitConverter.ToInt32(BitConverter.GetBytes(Number), 0);Di2015NewLine                num3 &= (long)0xffffffffL;Di2015NewLine                rndSeed = (int)((num3 + (num3 >> 0x18)) & 0xffffffL);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            rndSeed = (int)(((rndSeed * 0x43fd43fdL) + 0xc39ec3L) & 0xffffffL);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        m_rndSeed = rndSeed;Di2015NewLine        return (((float)rndSeed) / 1.677722E+07f);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1561460Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    object obj = new object();Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Main thread wants the lock");Di2015NewLine    lock (obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Main thread has the lock...");Di2015NewLine        ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem(ThreadMethod, obj);Di2015NewLine        Thread.Sleep(1000);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Main thread about to wait...");Di2015NewLine        Monitor.Wait(obj); // this releases and re-acquires the lockDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Main thread woke up");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Main thread has released the lock");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinestatic void ThreadMethod(object obj)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Pool thread wants the lock");Di2015NewLine    lock (obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Pool thread has the lock");Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("(press return)");Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        Monitor.PulseAll(obj); // this signals, but doesn't release the lockDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Pool thread has pulsed");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Pool thread has released the lock");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine     char nextChar;Di2015NewLine     int next;Di2015NewLine     doDi2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        next = this.Read();Di2015NewLine        if (next < 0)Di2015NewLine           break;Di2015NewLine        nextChar = (char)next;Di2015NewLine        if (char.IsWhiteSpace(nextChar))Di2015NewLine           break;Di2015NewLine (sb.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine        currentWord = sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine     elseDi2015NewLine        currentWord = null;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public bool dummy);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public int NextInt()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     tryDi2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        return int.Parse(currentWord);Di2015NewLine 1563170Di2015UniqueSeparator/*Note unsafe keyword*/Di2015NewLinepublic unsafe Image ThresholdUA(float thresh)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Bitmap b = new Bitmap(_image);//note this has several overloads, including a path to an imageDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    BitmapData bData = b.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, _image.Width, _image.Height), ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, b.PixelFormat);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    byte bitsPerPixel = GetBitsPerPixel(bData.PixelFormat);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /*This time we convert the IntPtr to a ptr*/Di2015NewLine    byte* scan0 = (byte*)bData.Scan0.ToPointer();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < bData.Height; ++i)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int j = 0; j < bData.Width; ++j)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte* data = scan0 + i * bData.Stride + j * bitsPerPixel / 8;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //data is a pointer to the first byte of the 3-byte color dataDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    b.UnlockBits(bData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return b;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1563170Di2015UniqueSeparator/*No unsafe keyword!*/Di2015NewLinepublic Image ThresholdMA(float thresh)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Bitmap b = new Bitmap(_image);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    BitmapData bData = b.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, _image.Width, _image.Height), ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, b.PixelFormat);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /* GetBitsPerPixel just does a switch on the PixelFormat and returns the number */Di2015NewLine    byte bitsPerPixel = GetBitsPerPixel(bData.PixelFormat);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /*the size of the image in bytes */Di2015NewLine    int size = bData.Stride * bData.Height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /*Allocate buffer for image*/Di2015NewLine    byte[] data = new byte[size];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /*This overload copies data of /size/ into /data/ from location specified (/Scan0/)*/Di2015NewLine    System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.Copy(bData.Scan0, data, 0, size);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < size; i += bitsPerPixel / 8 )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double magnitude = 1/3d*(data[i] +data[i + 1] +data[i + 2]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //data[i] is the first of 3 bytes of colorDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /* This override copies the data back into the location specified */Di2015NewLine    System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.Copy(data, 0, bData.Scan0, data.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    b.UnlockBits(bData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return b;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1565736Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineinterface IGroundUserDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bool Invoke(); // do your stuff; return true to wake up *everyone*Di2015NewLine                   // afterwards, else falseDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineclass Team : IGroundUserDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly string name;Di2015NewLine    public Team(string name) { this.name = name; }Di2015NewLine    public override string ToString() { return name; }Di2015NewLine    public bool Invoke()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(name + ": playing...");Di2015NewLine        Thread.Sleep(25 * 250);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(name + ": leaving...");Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineclass Cleaner : IGroundUserDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override string ToString() {return "cleaner";}Di2015NewLine    public bool Invoke()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("cleaning in progress");Di2015NewLine        Thread.Sleep(10 * 250);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("cleaning complete");Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineclass FootBallGroundDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var ground = new FootBallGround();Di2015NewLine        ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem(delegate { ground.UseGrounds(new Team("Team A")); });Di2015NewLine        ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem(delegate { ground.UseGrounds(new Team("Team B")); });Di2015NewLine        ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem(delegate { ground.UseGrounds(new Cleaner()); });Di2015NewLine        ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem(delegate { ground.UseGrounds(new Team("Team C")); });Di2015NewLine        ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem(delegate { ground.UseGrounds(new Team("Team D")); });Di2015NewLine        ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem(delegate { ground.UseGrounds(new Team("Team E")); });Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    bool busy;Di2015NewLine    private readonly object syncLock = new object();Di2015NewLine    public void UseGrounds(IGroundUser newUser)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // validate outside of lockDi2015NewLine        if (newUser == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("newUser");Di2015NewLine        // only need the lock when **changing** stateDi2015NewLine        lock (syncLock)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (busy)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(newUser + ": grounds are busy; waiting...");Di2015NewLine                Monitor.Wait(syncLock);Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(newUser + ": got nudged");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            busy = true; // we've got it!Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // do this outside the lock, allowing other users to queueDi2015NewLine        // waiting for it to be freeDi2015NewLine        bool wakeAll = newUser.Invoke();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // exit the gameDi2015NewLine        lock (syncLock)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            busy = false;Di2015NewLine            // wake up somebody (or everyone with PulseAll)Di2015NewLine            if (wakeAll) Monitor.PulseAll(syncLock);Di2015NewLine            else Monitor.Pulse(syncLock);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }    Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1565954Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEqualityComparer
1565954Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate class StandardPathwayModuleComparer : IEqualityComparer<IPathwayModule>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public bool Equals(IPathwayModule x, IPathwayModule y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (x == y) return true;Di2015NewLine        if (x == null || y == null) return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if ((x.Class == null) ^ (y.Class == null)) return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (x.Class == null) //and implicitly y.Class == nullDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return x.Block.Equals(y.Block) && x.Status.Equals(y.Status) && x.Module.ModuleId.Equals(y.Module.ModuleId);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return x.Block.Equals(y.Block) && x.Status.Equals(y.Status) && x.Module.ModuleId.Equals(y.Module.ModuleId) && x.Class.ClassId.Equals(y.Class.ClassId);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public int GetHashCode(IPathwayModule obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        unchecked {Di2015NewLine            int h = obj.Block ^ obj.Module.ModuleId.GetHashCode() ^ (int) obj.Status;Di2015NewLine            if (obj.Class != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine               h ^= obj.Class.ClassId.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return h;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class EventFireNotifierDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static private readonly Dictionary<int, EventInfo> eventsMap = new Dictionary<int, EventInfo>();Di2015NewLine        static private readonly Dictionary<int, Action<EventInfo>> actionsMap = new Dictionary<int, Action<EventInfo>>();Di2015NewLine        static private int lastIndexUsed;Di2015NewLine        public static MethodInfo GenerateHandlerNorifier(EventInfo eventInfo, Action<EventInfo> action)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MethodInfo method = eventIndex;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var parameterTypes = method.GetParameters().Select(info => info.ParameterType).ToArray();Di2015NewLine            AddMethodDynamically(typeBuilder, Di2015NewLine                                                                                          typeof(string),Di2015NewLine                                                                                    typeof(StatusTextBlock),Di2015NewLine                                                                                    new FrameworkPropertyMetadata(string.Empty, FrameworkPropertyMetadataOptions.None, StatusTextBlock.StatusTextPropertyChangedCallback, null));Di2015NewLine    private static readonly Regex UriMatchingRegex = new Regex(@"(?<url>[a-zA-Z]+:\\/\\/[a-zA-Z0-9]+([\\-\\.]{1}[a-zA-Z0-9]+)*\\.[a-zA-Z]{2,5}(:[0-9]{1,5})?([a-zA-Z0-9_\\-\\.\\~\\%\\+\\?\\=\\&\\;\\|/]*)?)|(?<emailAddress>[^\\s]+@[a-zA-Z0-9]+([\\-\\.]{1}[a-zA-Z0-9]+)*\\.[a-zA-Z]{2,5})|(?<toTwitterScreenName>\\@[a-zA-Z0-9\\-_]+)", RegexOptions.Compiled);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region ConstructorsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public StatusTextBlock()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region Type specific propertiesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string StatusTextDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine            this.SetValue(StatusTextBlock.StatusTextProperty, value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region Helper methodsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal static IEnumerable<Inline> GenerateInlinesFromRawEntryText(string entryText)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int startIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine        Match match = StatusTextBlock.UriMatchingRegex.Match(entryText);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while(match.Success)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(startIndex != match.Index)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                yield return new Run(StatusTextBlock.DecodeStatusEntryText(entryText.Substring(startIndex, match.Index - startIndex)));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Hyperlink hyperLink = new Hyperlink(new Run(match.Value));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string uri = match.Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if(match.Groups["emailAddress"].Success)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                uri = "mailto:" + uri;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if(match.Groups["toTwitterScreenName"].Success)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                uri = "http://twitter.com/" + uri.Substring(1);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            hyperLink.NavigateUri = new Uri(uri);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            yield return hyperLink;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            startIndex = match.Index + match.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            match = match.NextMatch();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(startIndex != entryText.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return new Run(StatusTextBlock.DecodeStatusEntryText(entryText.Substring(startIndex)));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal static string DecodeStatusEntryText(string text)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return text.Replace(">", ">").Replace("<", "<");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static 1567840Di2015UniqueSeparator# SUCCUBUS is 1 2 3 3 2 4 2 1 (only 4 is unique)Di2015NewLine(.)                      # nr 1 in patternDi2015NewLine(.)                      # nr 2 in patternDi2015NewLine(.)                      # nr 3 in patternDi2015NewLine\\3                       # repeat 3Di2015NewLine\\2                       # repeat 2Di2015NewLine(.)(?!.*\\4)(?<!\\4.+)     # nr 4 UNIQUE!Di2015NewLine\\2                       # repeat 2Di2015NewLine\\1                       # repeat 1Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine# PAST (all unique: 1 2 3 4)Di2015NewLine(.)(?!.*\\1)(?<!\\1.+)    # nr 1 in patternDi2015NewLine(.)(?!.*\\2)(?<!\\2.+)    # nr 2 in patternDi2015NewLine(.)(?!.*\\3)(?<!\\3.+)    # nr 3 in patternDi2015NewLine(.)(?!.*\\4)(?<!\\4.+)    # nr 4 in patternDi2015NewLine

1573594Di2015UniqueSeparator class Base : ICloneableDi2015NewLine { Di2015NewLine     List<int> xs;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     public virtual object Clone()Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine         Base result = this.MemberwiseClone();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         // xs points to same List object here, but we wantDi2015NewLine         // a new List object with copy of dataDi2015NewLine         result.xs = new List<int>(xs);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         return result;Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine class Derived : BaseDi2015NewLine { Di2015NewLine     List<int> ys;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     public override object Clone()Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine         // Cast is legal, because MemberwiseClone() will use theDi2015NewLine         // actual type of the object to instantiate the copy.Di2015NewLine         Derived result = (Derived)base.Clone();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         // ys points to same List object here, but we wantDi2015NewLine         // a new List object with copy of dataDi2015NewLine         result.ys = new List<int>(ys);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         return result;Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine

1574356Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic class IEnumerableExtensions {Di2015NewLine    public static T SelectMin<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source, Func<T, int> selector) {Di2015NewLine        if (source == null) {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("source");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int min = 0;Di2015NewLine        T returnValue = default(T);Di2015NewLine        bool flag = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (T t in source) {Di2015NewLine            int value = selector(t);Di2015NewLine            if (flag) {Di2015NewLine                if (value < min) {Di2015NewLine                    returnValue = t;Di2015NewLine                    min = value;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else {Di2015NewLine                min = value;Di2015NewLine                returnValue = t;Di2015NewLine                flag = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!flag) {Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException("source is empty");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return returnValue;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

1577087Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing System.DirectoryServices;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace DirectoryTestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  class ProgramDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Int32 counter = 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      TestConnection();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void TestConnection()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      String domainOne = "LDAP://DC=domain,DC=one";Di2015NewLine      String domainOneName = "DOMAINONE";Di2015NewLine      String domainOneUser = "onetest";Di2015NewLine      String domainOnePass = "testingONE!";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      String domainTwo = "LDAP://DC=domain,DC=two";Di2015NewLine      String domainTwoName = "DOMAINTWO";Di2015NewLine      String domainTwoUser = "twotest";Di2015NewLine      String domainTwoPass = "testingTWO!";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      String invalidDomain = "INVALIDDOMAIN";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // 1) This works because it's the correct NT Account Name in the same domain:Di2015NewLine      Connect(domainOne, domainOneName + "\\\\" + domainOneUser, domainOnePass);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // 2) This works because username can be supplied without the domain partDi2015NewLine      // (plain username = sAMAccountName):Di2015NewLine      Connect(domainOne, domainOneUser, domainOnePass);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // 3) This works because there's a fall back in DirectoryEntry to drop the domain partDi2015NewLine      // and attempt connection using the plain username (sAMAccountName) in (in this case)Di2015NewLine      // the forrest root domain:Di2015NewLine      Connect(domainOne, invalidDomain + "\\\\" + domainOneUser, domainOnePass);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // 4) This works because the forrest is searched for a domain matching domainTwoName:Di2015NewLine      Connect(domainOne, domainTwoName + "\\\\" + domainTwoUser, domainTwoPass);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // 5) This fails because domainTwoUser is not in the forrest root (domainOne)Di2015NewLine      // and because no domain was specified other domains are not searched:Di2015NewLine      Connect(domainOne, domainTwoUser, domainTwoPass);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // 6) This fails as well because the fallback of dropping the domain name and usingDi2015NewLine      // the plain username fails (there's no domainTwoUser in domainOne):Di2015NewLine      Connect(domainOne, invalidDomain + "\\\\" + domainTwoUser, domainTwoPass);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // 7) This fails because there's no domainTwoUser in domainOneName:Di2015NewLine      Connect(domainOne, domainOneName + "\\\\" + domainTwoUser, domainTwoPass);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // 8) This works because there's a domainTwoUser in domainTwoName:Di2015NewLine      Connect(domainTwo, domainTwoName + "\\\\" + domainTwoUser, domainTwoPass);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // 9) This works because of the fallback to using plain username when connectingDi2015NewLine      // to domainTwo with an invalid domain name but using domainTwoUser/Pass:Di2015NewLine      Connect(domainTwo, invalidDomain + "\\\\" + domainTwoUser, domainTwoPass);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void Connect(String path, String username, String password)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      Console.WriteLine(Di2015NewLine        "{0}) Path: {1} User: {2} Pass: {3}",Di2015NewLine        counter, path, username, password);Di2015NewLine      DirectoryEntry de = new DirectoryEntry(path, username, password);Di2015NewLine      tryDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        de.RefreshCache();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0} = {1}", username, "Autenticated");Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0} ({1})", ex.Message, username);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine      counter++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1577607Di2015UniqueSeparator public string ResizeImageAndSave(int Width, int Height, string imageUrl, string destPath)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        System.Drawing.Image fullSizeImg = System.Drawing.Image.FromFile(imageUrl);Di2015NewLine        double widthRatio = (double)fullSizeImg.Width / (double)Width;Di2015NewLine        double heightRatio = (double)fullSizeImg.Height / (double)Height;Di2015NewLine        double ratio = Math.Max(widthRatio, heightRatio);Di2015NewLine        int newWidth = (int)(fullSizeImg.Width / ratio);Di2015NewLine        int newHeight = (int)(fullSizeImg.Height / ratio);Di2015NewLine        //System.Drawing.Image.GetThumbnailImageAbort dummyCallBack = new System.Drawing.Image.GetThumbnailImageAbort(ThumbnailCallback);Di2015NewLine        System.Drawing.Image thumbNailImg = fullSizeImg.GetThumbnailImage(newWidth, newHeight, new System.Drawing.Image.GetThumbnailImageAbort(ThumbnailCallback), IntPtr.Zero);Di2015NewLine        //DateTime MyDate = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine        //String MyString = MyDate.ToString("ddMMyyhhmmss") + imageUrl.Substring(imageUrl.LastIndexOf("."));Di2015NewLine        thumbNailImg.Save(destPath, ImageFormat.Jpeg);Di2015NewLine        thumbNailImg.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        return "";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public bool ThumbnailCallback() { return false; }Di2015NewLine
1577671Di2015UniqueSeparator// retrieve a summary of html, with no less than 'max' wordsDi2015NewLinestring GetSummary(string html, int max)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine\string summaryHtml = string.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine\// load our html documentDi2015NewLine\HtmlDocument htmlDoc = new HtmlDocument();Di2015NewLine\htmlDoc.LoadHtml(html);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine\int wordCount = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine\foreach (var element in htmlDoc.DocumentNode.ChildNodes)Di2015NewLine\{Di2015NewLine\\// inner text will strip out all html, and give us plain textDi2015NewLine\\string elementText = element.InnerText;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine\\// we split by space to get all the words in this elementDi2015NewLine\\string[] elementWords = elementText.Split(new char[] { ' ' });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine\\// and if we haven't used too many words ...Di2015NewLine\\if (wordCount <= max)Di2015NewLine\\{Di2015NewLine\\\// add the *outer* HTML (which will have proper Di2015NewLine\\\// html formatting for this fragment) to the summaryDi2015NewLine\\\summaryHtml += element.OuterHtml;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine\\\wordCount += elementWords.Count() + 1;Di2015NewLine\\}Di2015NewLine\\else Di2015NewLine\\{ Di2015NewLine\\\break; Di2015NewLine\\}Di2015NewLine\}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine\return summaryHtml;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1578978Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class HttpWebConnectionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [DllImport("wininet.dll", CharSet = CharSet.Auto, SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine    protected static extern cookieData,Di2015NewLine        ref int length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public HttpWebConnection()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Cookies = new CookieContainer();Di2015NewLine baseAddress;Di2015NewLine        BaseUri = new Uri(BaseAddress);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool AutoRedirect { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Uri BaseUri { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string BaseAddress { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public CookieContainer Cookies { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public virtual HttpWebResponse Send(string method, Uri uri)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Send(method, uri, null, false);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public virtual HttpWebResponse Send(string method, Uri uri, string post, bool authenticating)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Uri absoluteUri = null;Di2015NewLine        if (uri.IsAbsoluteUri)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            absoluteUri = uri;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            absoluteUri = new Uri(BaseUri, uri);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        HttpWebRequest request = WebRequest.Create(absoluteUri) as HttpWebRequest;Di2015NewLine        request.CookieContainer = Cookies;Di2015NewLine        request.Method = method;Di2015NewLine        if (method == "POST")Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            request.ContentType = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        request.AllowAutoRedirect = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(post))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Stream requestStream = request.GetRequestStream();Di2015NewLine            byte[] buffer = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(post);Di2015NewLine            requestStream.Write(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine            requestStream.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine 1580170Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Grayscales a given image.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="image">Di2015NewLine/// The image that is transformed to a grayscale image.Di2015NewLine/// </param>Di2015NewLinepublic static void GrayScaleImage(Bitmap image)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (image == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("image");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // lock the bitmap.Di2015NewLine    var data = image.LockBits(Di2015NewLine                  new Rectangle(0, 0, image.Width, image.Height), Di2015NewLine                  ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, image.PixelFormat);Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        unsafeDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // get a pointer to the data.Di2015NewLine            byte* ptr = (byte*)data.Scan0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // loop over all the data.Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < data.Height; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (int j = 0; j < data.Width; j++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // calculate the gray value.Di2015NewLine                    byte y = (byte)(Di2015NewLine                        (0.299 * ptr[2]) + Di2015NewLine                        (0.587 * ptr[1]) + Di2015NewLine                        (0.114 * ptr[0]));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // set the gray value.Di2015NewLine                    ptr[0] = ptr[1] = ptr[2] = y;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // increment the pointer.Di2015NewLine                    ptr += 3;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // move on to the next line.Di2015NewLine                ptr += data.Stride - data.Width * 3;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // unlock the bits when done or when Di2015NewLine        // an exception has been thrown.Di2015NewLine        image.UnlockBits(data);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public CustomersByTime (IEnumerable <Repository.Record> records)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Contractors = new List<Person>();Di2015NewLine            foreach (Repository.Record record in records)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int contractorIndex = Contractors.FindIndex(p => p.person_name == record.Contractor.person_name);Di2015NewLine                if (contractorIndex == -1)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Contractors.Add(record.Contractor);Di2015NewLine                    contractorIndex = Contractors.Count - 1;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                List<Person> customerList;Di2015NewLine                if (!this.TryGetValue(record.Time, out customerList))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    customerList = new List<Person>();Di2015NewLine                    this.Add(record.Time, customerList);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                while (customerList.Count < contractorIndex)Di2015NewLine                    customerList.Add (null);    // fill in blanks if neededDi2015NewLine                customerList.Add (record.Customer);    // fill in blanks if neededDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            MakeSameLength();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // extend each list to match the longest one. makes databinding easier.Di2015NewLine        public void MakeSameLength()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int max = 0;Di2015NewLine            foreach (var value in this.Values)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (value.Count > max)Di2015NewLine                    max = value.Count;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            foreach (var value in this.Values)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                while (value.Count < max)Di2015NewLine                    value.Add(null);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected void Page_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        CustomersByTime Customers = new CustomersByTime(Repository.GetCustomerByDateCategory());Di2015NewLine        CustomerListView.DataSource = Customers;Di2015NewLine        CustomerListView.DataBind();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine</script> Di2015NewLine<html>Di2015NewLine<head>Di2015NewLine<style type="text/css">Di2015NewLine    td, th, table { border:solid 1px black;
