1582888Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic IEnumerable<int> Permute(int x, int y, int z)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    yield return x * 100 + y * 10 + z;Di2015NewLine    yield return x * 100 + z * 10 + y;Di2015NewLine    yield return y * 100 + x * 10 + z;Di2015NewLine    yield return y * 100 + z * 10 + x;Di2015NewLine    yield return z * 100 + x * 10 + y;Di2015NewLine    yield return z * 100 + y * 10 + x;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinestatic void Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var divs = new[] {3,5,7,11,13,17};Di2015NewLine    // combinations of 1-9Di2015NewLine    var combinations =Di2015NewLine              from x in Enumerable.Range(1, 7)Di2015NewLine              from y in Enumerable.Range(x + 1, 8 - x)Di2015NewLine              from z in Enumerable.Range(y + 1, 9 - y)Di2015NewLine              select new { x, y, z };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // permuteDi2015NewLine    var qry = from comb in combinationsDi2015NewLine              where !Permute(comb.x, comb.y, comb.z).Any(Di2015NewLine                i => divs.Any(d => i % d == 0))Di2015NewLine              select comb;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var answer in qry)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0}, {1}, {2}", answer.x, answer.y, answer.z);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1582888Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main() {Di2015NewLine    var data = Enumerable.Range(1, 9);Di2015NewLine    var magicSquares =Di2015NewLine        // generate 1st row and deduce the targetDi2015NewLine        from a in data let arrA = new[] { a }Di2015NewLine        from b in data.Except(arrA) let arrB = new[] { a,b }Di2015NewLine        from c in data.Except(arrB) let arrC = new[] { a,b,c }Di2015NewLine        let target = a + b + cDi2015NewLine        // generate 2nd row and filter to target matchesDi2015NewLine        from d in data.Except(arrC) let arrD = new[] { a,b,c,d }Di2015NewLine        from e in data.Except(arrD) let arrE = new[] { a,b,c,d,e }Di2015NewLine        from f in data.Except(arrE) let arrF = new[] { a,b,c,d,e,f }Di2015NewLine        where d + e + f == target Di2015NewLine        // generate 3rd row and filter to target matchesDi2015NewLine        from g in data.Except(arrF) let arrG = new[] { a,b,c,d,e,f,g }Di2015NewLine        from h in data.Except(arrG) let arrH = new[] { a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h }Di2015NewLine        from i in data.Except(arrH)Di2015NewLine        where g + h + i == targetDi2015NewLine        // filter columnsDi2015NewLine           && a + d + g == targetDi2015NewLine           && b + e + h == targetDi2015NewLine           && c + f + i == targetDi2015NewLine        // filter diagonalsDi2015NewLine           && a + e + i == targetDi2015NewLine           && c + e + g == target Di2015NewLine       select new {a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var row in magicSquares)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0} {1} {2}", row.a, row.b, row.c);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0} {1} {2}", row.d, row.e, row.f);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0} {1} {2}", row.g, row.h, row.i);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1587537Di2015UniqueSeparatorint chunkSize = 1024;Di2015NewLineint sent = 0Di2015NewLineint total = reader.Length;Di2015NewLineDateTime started = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLinewhile (reader.Position < reader.Length)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] buffer = new byte[Di2015NewLine        Math.Min(chunkSize, reader.Length - reader.Position)];Di2015NewLine    readBytes = reader.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // send data packetDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    sent += readBytes;Di2015NewLine    TimeSpan elapsedTime = DateTime.Now - started;Di2015NewLine    TimeSpan estimatedTime = Di2015NewLine        TimeSpan.FromSeconds(Di2015NewLine            (total - sent) / Di2015NewLine            ((double)sent  / elapsedTime.TotalSeconds));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1597034Di2015UniqueSeparator    DynamicAccessor<T> dynAccessor = new DynamicAccessor<T>();Di2015NewLine    MethodInfo AppendMethod = typeof(StringBuilder).GetMethod("Append", new[] { typeof(Object) }); //Append method of StringbuilderDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var method = new DynamicMethod("ClassWriter", typeof(StringBuilder), new[] { typeof(T) }, typeof(T), true);Di2015NewLine    var generator = method.GetILGenerator();Di2015NewLine    generator.Emit(OpCodes.Newobj, typeof(StringBuilder).GetConstructor(Type.EmptyTypes)); //make our string builder Di2015NewLine    //iterate through all the instance of T's props and sb.Append their values.Di2015NewLine    PropertyInfo[] props = typeof(T).GetProperties(BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance);Di2015NewLine    foreach (var info in props)Di2015NewLine    {   Di2015NewLine        generator.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0);Di2015NewLine        generator.Emit(OpCodes.Callvirt, info.GetGetMethod()); //call the GetterDi2015NewLine        if (info.PropertyType.IsValueType)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            generator.Emit(OpCodes.Box, info.PropertyType);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        generator.Emit(OpCodes.Callvirt, AppendMethod);        //Call Append Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    generator.Emit(OpCodes.Ret);           //return pointer to sbDi2015NewLine

   Di2015NewLine            }    Di2015NewLine            if (IconSize.Small == size)    Di2015NewLine            {       flags += SHGFI_SMALLICON;    Di2015NewLine            }     Di2015NewLine            else     Di2015NewLine            {       Di2015NewLine                flags += SHGFI_LARGEICON;    Di2015NewLine            }    Di2015NewLine            // Get the folder icon    Di2015NewLine            var shfi = new SHFILEINFO();    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var res = SHGetFileInfo(@"C:\\Windows",                             Di2015NewLine                FILE_ATTRIBUTE_DIRECTORY,                             Di2015NewLine                out shfi,                             Di2015NewLine                (uint) Marshal.SizeOf(shfi),                             Di2015NewLine                flags );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (res == IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine                throw Marshal.GetExceptionForHR(Marshal.GetHRForLastWin32Error());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Load the icon from an HICON handle  Di2015NewLine            Icon.FromHandle(shfi.hIcon);    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Now clone the icon, so that it can be successfully stored in an ImageListDi2015NewLine            var icon = (Icon)Icon.FromHandle(shfi.hIcon).Clone();    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            DestroyIcon( shfi.hIcon );        // Cleanup    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return icon;}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Form1()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void Form1_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Icon icon = GetFolderIcon(IconSize.Large, FolderType.Open);Di2015NewLine                pictureBox1.Image = icon.ToBitmap();Di2015NewLine                // Note: The image actually should be disposed somewhereDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                MessageBox.Show(ex.Message);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1605220Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate bool IsPropertyOrSubPropertyOf(Object Owner, Object LookFor)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (Owner.Equals(LookFor))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // is it a property if they are the same?Di2015NewLine        // may need a enum rather than boolDi2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    PropertyInfo[] Properties = Owner.GetType().GetProperties();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (PropertyInfo pInfo in Properties)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var Value = pInfo.GetValue(Owner, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (typeof(IEnumerable).IsAssignableFrom(Value.GetType()))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Becomes more complicated if it can be a collection of collectionsDi2015NewLine            foreach (Object O in (IEnumerable)Value)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (IsPropertyOrSubPropertyOf(O, LookFor))Di2015NewLine                    return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (IsPropertyOrSubPropertyOf(Value, LookFor))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1605990Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T[] Concat<T>(T[] firstSource, T[] secondSource,Di2015NewLine    params T[] restOfSources)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // omitted validation of non-null arguments, etc.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Int32 totalLength = firstSource.Length + secondSource.Length;Di2015NewLine    foreach (T[] source in restOfSources)Di2015NewLine        totalLength += source.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    T[] result = new T[totalLength];Di2015NewLine    Int32 currentIndex = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Array.Copy(firstSource, 0, result, currentIndex, firstSource.Length);Di2015NewLine    currentIndex += firstSource.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Array.Copy(secondSource, 0, result, currentIndex, secondSource.Length);Di2015NewLine    currentIndex += secondSource.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (T[] source in restOfSources)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Array.Copy(source, 0, result, currentIndex, source.Length);Di2015NewLine        currentIndex += source.Length;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1605990Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar stringies1 = ...Di2015NewLinevar stringies2 = ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar stringies3 = YourClass.Concat(stringies1, stringies2);Di2015NewLine
1605998Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<KeyValuePair<string, decimal>> list = new List<KeyValuePair<string, decimal>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int iItem = 0; iItem < 10; iItem++)Di2015NewLine                list.Add(new KeyValuePair<string, decimal>(iItem.ToString(), iItem/10m));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Random rnd = new Random();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            list.Sort(  delegate(KeyValuePair<string, decimal> item1, KeyValuePair<string, decimal> item2) Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            if (item1.Value == item2.Value)Di2015NewLine                                return 0;Di2015NewLine                            decimal weight1 = 1 / (item1.Value == 0 ? 0.01m : item1.Value);Di2015NewLine                            decimal weight2 = 1 / (item2.Value == 0 ? 0.01m : item2.Value);Di2015NewLine                            return (weight1 * rnd.Next()).CompareTo(weight2 * rnd.Next()); Di2015NewLine                        });Di2015NewLine            list.Reverse();Di2015NewLine

{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private DeviceHelper()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Enable or disable a device.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="classGuid">The class guid of the device. Available in the device manager.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="instanceId">The device instance id of the device. Available in the device manager.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="enable">True to enable, False to disable.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <remarks>Will throw an exception if the device is not Disableable.</remarks>Di2015NewLine        public static void SetDeviceEnabled(Guid classGuid, string instanceId, bool enable)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            SafeDeviceInfoSetHandle diSetHandle = null;Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Get the handle to a device information set for all devices matching classGuid that are present on the Di2015NewLine                // system.Di2015NewLine                diSetHandle = NativeMethods.SetupDiGetClassDevs(ref classGuid, null, IntPtr.Zero, SetupDiGetClassDevsFlags.Present);Di2015NewLine                // Get the device information data for each matching device.Di2015NewLine                DeviceInfoData[] diData = GetDeviceInfoData(diSetHandle);Di2015NewLine                // Find the index of our instance. i.e. the touchpad mouse - I have 3 mice attached...Di2015NewLine                int index = GetIndexOfInstance(diSetHandle, diData, instanceId);Di2015NewLine                // Disable...Di2015NewLine                EnableDevice(diSetHandle, diData[index], enable);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (diSetHandle != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (diSetHandle.IsClosed == false)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        diSetHandle.Close();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    diSetHandle.Dispose();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static DeviceInfoData[] GetDeviceInfoData(SafeDeviceInfoSetHandle handle)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            List<DeviceInfoData> data = new List<DeviceInfoData>();Di2015NewLine            DeviceInfoData did = new DeviceInfoData();Di2015NewLine            int didSize = Marshal.SizeOf(did);Di2015NewLine            did.Size = didSize;Di2015NewLine            int index = 0;Di2015NewLine            while (NativeMethods.SetupDiEnumDeviceInfo(handle, index, ref did))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                data.Add(did);Di2015NewLine                index += 1;Di2015NewLine                did = new DeviceInfoData();Di2015NewLine                did.Size = didSize;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return data.ToArray();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Find the index of the particular DeviceInfoData for the instanceId.Di2015NewLine        private static int GetIndexOfInstance(SafeDeviceInfoSetHandle handle, DeviceInfoData[] diData, string instanceId)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            const int ERROR_INSUFFICIENT_BUFFER = 122;Di2015NewLine            for (int index = 0; index <= diData.Length - 1; index++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(1);Di2015NewLine                int requiredSize = 0;Di2015NewLine                bool result = NativeMethods.SetupDiGetDeviceInstanceId(handle.DangerousGetHandle(), ref diData[index], sb, sb.Capacity, out requiredSize);Di2015NewLine                if (result == false && Marshal.GetLastWin32Error() == ERROR_INSUFFICIENT_BUFFER)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    sb.Capacity = requiredSize;Di2015NewLine                    result = NativeMethods.SetupDiGetDeviceInstanceId(handle.DangerousGetHandle(), ref diData[index], sb, sb.Capacity, out requiredSize);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (result == false)Di2015NewLine                    throw new Win32Exception();Di2015NewLine                if (instanceId.Equals(sb.ToString()))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return index;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // not foundDi2015NewLine            return -1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // enable/disable...Di2015NewLine        private static void EnableDevice(SafeDeviceInfoSetHandle handle, DeviceInfoData diData, bool enable)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            PropertyChangeParameters @params = new PropertyChangeParameters();Di2015NewLine            // The size is just the size of the header, but we've flattened the structure.Di2015NewLine            // The header comprises the first two fields, both integer.Di2015NewLine            @params.Size = 8;Di2015NewLine            @params.DiFunction = DiFunction.PropertyChange;Di2015NewLine            @params.Scope = Scopes.Global;Di2015NewLine            if (enable)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                @params.StateChange = StateChangeAction.Enable;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                @params.StateChange = StateChangeAction.Disable;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            bool result = NativeMethods.SetupDiSetClassInstallParams(handle, ref diData, ref @params, Marshal.SizeOf(@params));Di2015NewLine            if (result == false) throw new Win32Exception();Di2015NewLine            result = NativeMethods.SetupDiCallClassInstaller(DiFunction.PropertyChange, handle, ref diData);Di2015NewLine            if (result == false)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int err = Marshal.GetLastWin32Error();Di2015NewLine                if (err == (int)SetupApiError.NotDisableable)Di2015NewLine                    throw new ArgumentException("Device can't be disabled (programmatically or in Device Manager).");Di2015NewLine                else if (err >= (int)SetupApiError.NoAssociatedClass && err <= (int)SetupApiError.OnlyValidateViaAuthenticode)Di2015NewLine                    throw new Win32Exception("SetupAPI error: " + ((SetupApiError)err).ToString());Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    throw new Win32Exception();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1610685Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// The GetForegroundWindow function returns a handle to the foreground window.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    [DllImport("user32.dll")]Di2015NewLine    static extern IntPtr GetForegroundWindow();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static bool IsProcessFocused(string processname)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (processname == null || processname.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("processname");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Process[] runninProcesses = Process.GetProcessesByName(processname);Di2015NewLine        IntPtr activeWindowHandle = GetForegroundWindow();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (Process process in runninProcesses)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (process.MainWindowHandle.Equals(activeWindowHandle))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Process was not found or didn't had the focus.Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

1616207Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static T[][] Split<T>(this T[] arrayIn, int length)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool even = arrayIn.Length%length == 0;Di2015NewLine        int totalLength = arrayIn.Length/length;Di2015NewLine        if (!even)Di2015NewLine            totalLength++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        T[][] newArray = new T[totalLength][];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < totalLength;++i )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int allocLength = length;Di2015NewLine            if (!even && i == totalLength - 1)Di2015NewLine                allocLength = arrayIn.Length % length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            newArray[i] = new T[allocLength];Di2015NewLine            Array.Copy(arrayIn, i * length, newArray[i], 0, allocLength);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return newArray;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int[] numbers = new int[8010];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < numbers.Length; ++i)Di2015NewLine            numbers[i] = i;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int[][] sectionedNumbers = numbers.Split(1000);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0}", sectionedNumbers.Length);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0}", sectionedNumbers[7].Length);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0}", sectionedNumbers[1][0]);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0}", sectionedNumbers[7][298]);Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1619375Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Calculates number of business days, taking into account:Di2015NewLine    ///  - weekends (Saturdays and Sundays)Di2015NewLine    ///  - bank holidays in the middle of the weekDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="firstDay">First day in the time interval</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="lastDay">Last day in the time interval</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="bankHolidays">List of bank holidays excluding weekends</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Number of business days during the 'span'</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static int BusinessDaysUntil(this DateTime firstDay, DateTime lastDay, params DateTime[] bankHolidays)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        firstDay = firstDay.Date;Di2015NewLine        lastDay = lastDay.Date;Di2015NewLine        if (firstDay > lastDay)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Incorrect last day " + lastDay);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        TimeSpan span = lastDay - firstDay;Di2015NewLine        int businessDays = span.Days + 1;Di2015NewLine        int fullWeekCount = businessDays / 7;Di2015NewLine        // find out if there are weekends during the time exceedng the full weeksDi2015NewLine        if (businessDays > fullWeekCount*7)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // we are here to find out if there is a 1-day or 2-days weekendDi2015NewLine            // in the time interval remaining after subtracting the complete weeksDi2015NewLine            int firstDayOfWeek = (int) firstDay.DayOfWeek;Di2015NewLine            int lastDayOfWeek = (int) lastDay.DayOfWeek;Di2015NewLine            if (lastDayOfWeek < firstDayOfWeek)Di2015NewLine                lastDayOfWeek += 7;Di2015NewLine            if (firstDayOfWeek <= 6)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (lastDayOfWeek >= 7)// Both Saturday and Sunday are in the remaining time intervalDi2015NewLine                    businessDays -= 2;Di2015NewLine                else if (lastDayOfWeek >= 6)// Only Saturday is in the remaining time intervalDi2015NewLine                    businessDays -= 1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (firstDayOfWeek <= 7 && lastDayOfWeek >= 7)// Only Sunday is in the remaining time intervalDi2015NewLine                businessDays -= 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // subtract the weekends during the full weeks in the intervalDi2015NewLine        businessDays -= fullWeekCount + fullWeekCount;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // subtract the number of bank holidays during the time intervalDi2015NewLine        foreach (DateTime bankHoliday in bankHolidays)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DateTime bh = bankHoliday.Date;Di2015NewLine            if (firstDay <= bh && bh <= lastDay)Di2015NewLine                --businessDays;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return businessDays;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

1623968Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate Rectangle dragBoxFromMouseDown;Di2015NewLineprivate int rowIndexFromMouseDown;Di2015NewLineprivate int rowIndexOfItemUnderMouseToDrop;Di2015NewLineprivate void dataGridView1_MouseMove(object sender, MouseEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if ((e.Button & MouseButtons.Left) == MouseButtons.Left)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // If the mouse moves outside the rectangle, start the drag.Di2015NewLine        if (dragBoxFromMouseDown != Rectangle.Empty &&Di2015NewLine            !dragBoxFromMouseDown.Contains(e.X, e.Y))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Proceed with the drag and drop, passing in the list item.                    Di2015NewLine            DragDropEffects dropEffect = dataGridView1.DoDragDrop(Di2015NewLine    \\dataGridView1.Rows[rowIndexFromMouseDown],Di2015NewLine    \\DragDropEffects.Move);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void dataGridView1_MouseDown(object sender, MouseEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Get the index of the item the mouse is below.Di2015NewLine    rowIndexFromMouseDown = dataGridView1.HitTest(e.X, e.Y).RowIndex;Di2015NewLineif (rowIndexFromMouseDown != -1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Remember the point where the mouse down occurred. Di2015NewLine     // The DragSize indicates the size that the mouse can move Di2015NewLine     // before a drag event should be started.                Di2015NewLine        Size dragSize = SystemInformation.DragSize;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create a rectangle using the DragSize, with the mouse position beingDi2015NewLine        // at the center of the rectangle.Di2015NewLine        dragBoxFromMouseDown = new Rectangle(new Point(e.X - (dragSize.Width / 2),Di2015NewLine                                                       e.Y - (dragSize.Height / 2)),Di2015NewLine    \\\\\\dragSize);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        // Reset the rectangle if the mouse is not over an item in the ListBox.Di2015NewLine        dragBoxFromMouseDown = Rectangle.Empty;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void dataGridView1_DragOver(object sender, DragEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    e.Effect = DragDropEffects.Move;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void dataGridView1_DragDrop(object sender, DragEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // The mouse locations are relative to the screen, so they must be Di2015NewLine    // converted to client coordinates.Di2015NewLine    Point clientPoint = dataGridView1.PointToClient(new Point(e.X, e.Y));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Get the row index of the item the mouse is below. Di2015NewLine    rowIndexOfItemUnderMouseToDrop =Di2015NewLine        dataGridView1.HitTest(clientPoint.X, clientPoint.Y).RowIndex;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If the drag operation was a move then remove and insert the row.Di2015NewLine    if (e.Effect== DragDropEffects.Move)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DataGridViewRow rowToMove = e.Data.GetData(Di2015NewLine    \\typeof(DataGridViewRow)) as DataGridViewRow;Di2015NewLine        dataGridView1.Rows.RemoveAt(rowIndexFromMouseDown);Di2015NewLine        dataGridView1.Rows.Insert(rowIndexOfItemUnderMouseToDrop, rowToMove);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1627088Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IList<T> Randomise<T>(IList<T> list, int seed) Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Random rng = new Random(seed); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    List<T> ret = new List<T>(list);      Di2015NewLine    int n = ret.Length;            Di2015NewLine    while (n > 1) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        n--;                         Di2015NewLine        int k = rng.Next(n + 1);  Di2015NewLine        // Simple swap of variablesDi2015NewLine        T tmp = list[k];Di2015NewLine        ret[k] = ret[n];Di2015NewLine        ret[n] = tmp;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return ret;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1629927Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string EncryptString(string plainText)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Instantiate a new RijndaelManaged object to perform string symmetric encryptionDi2015NewLine    RijndaelManaged rijndaelCipher = new RijndaelManaged();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Set key and IVDi2015NewLine    rijndaelCipher.Key = Convert.FromBase64String("ABC");Di2015NewLine    rijndaelCipher.IV = Convert.FromBase64String("123");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Instantiate a new MemoryStream object to contain the encrypted bytesDi2015NewLine    MemoryStream memoryStream = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Instantiate a new encryptor from our RijndaelManaged objectDi2015NewLine    ICryptoTransform rijndaelEncryptor = rijndaelCipher.CreateEncryptor();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Instantiate a new CryptoStream object to process the data and write it to the Di2015NewLine    // memory streamDi2015NewLine    CryptoStream cryptoStream = new CryptoStream(memoryStream, rijndaelEncryptor, CryptoStreamMode.Write);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Convert the plainText string into a byte arrayDi2015NewLine    byte[] plainBytes = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(plainText);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Encrypt the input plaintext stringDi2015NewLine    cryptoStream.Write(plainBytes, 0, plainBytes.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Complete the encryption processDi2015NewLine    cryptoStream.FlushFinalBlock();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Convert the encrypted data from a MemoryStream to a byte arrayDi2015NewLine    byte[] cipherBytes = memoryStream.ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Close both the MemoryStream and the CryptoStreamDi2015NewLine    memoryStream.Close();Di2015NewLine    cryptoStream.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Convert the encrypted byte array to a base64 encoded stringDi2015NewLine    string cipherText = Convert.ToBase64String(cipherBytes, 0, cipherBytes.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Return the encrypted data as a stringDi2015NewLine    return cipherText;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic string DecryptString(string cipherText)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Instantiate a new RijndaelManaged object to perform string symmetric encryptionDi2015NewLine    RijndaelManaged rijndaelCipher = new RijndaelManaged();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Set key and IVDi2015NewLine    rijndaelCipher.Key = Convert.FromBase64String("ABC");Di2015NewLine    rijndaelCipher.IV = Convert.FromBase64String("123");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Instantiate a new MemoryStream object to contain the encrypted bytesDi2015NewLine    MemoryStream memoryStream = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Instantiate a new encryptor from our RijndaelManaged objectDi2015NewLine    ICryptoTransform rijndaelDecryptor = rijndaelCipher.CreateDecryptor();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Instantiate a new CryptoStream object to process the data and write it to the Di2015NewLine    // memory streamDi2015NewLine    CryptoStream cryptoStream = new CryptoStream(memoryStream, rijndaelDecryptor, CryptoStreamMode.Write);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Will contain decrypted plaintextDi2015NewLine    string plainText = String.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    \// Convert the ciphertext string into a byte arrayDi2015NewLine    \byte[] cipherBytes = Convert.FromBase64String(cipherText);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    \// Decrypt the input ciphertext stringDi2015NewLine    \cryptoStream.Write(cipherBytes, 0, cipherBytes.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    \// Complete the decryption processDi2015NewLine    \cryptoStream.FlushFinalBlock();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    \// Convert the decrypted data from a MemoryStream to a byte arrayDi2015NewLine    \byte[] plainBytes = memoryStream.ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    \// Convert the encrypted byte array to a base64 encoded stringDi2015NewLine    \plainText = Encoding.ASCII.GetString(plainBytes, 0, plainBytes.Length);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    \// Close both the MemoryStream and the CryptoStreamDi2015NewLine    \memoryStream.Close();Di2015NewLine    \cryptoStream.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Return the encrypted data as a stringDi2015NewLine    return plainText;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1633278Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate class StateDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public HttpContext Context { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public RequestService Service { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void ProcessRequest(HttpContext context)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic IAsyncResult BeginProcessRequest(HttpContext context, AsyncCallback cb, Object extraData)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Don't use using block or it will dispose the service before you can call EndGetFileDi2015NewLine    var state = new StateDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Service = new RequestService(),Di2015NewLine        Context = contextDi2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine    // Pass cb here and not EndProcessRequestDi2015NewLine    return state.Service.BeginGetFile(cb, state);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void EndProcessRequest(IAsyncResult result)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    State state = result.AsyncState as State;Di2015NewLine    // Be carefull as this may throw: it is best to put it in a try/finally blockDi2015NewLine    // so that you dispose properly of the serviceDi2015NewLine    byte[] buffer = state.Service.EndGetFile(result);Di2015NewLine    state.Service.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    state.Context.Response.ContentType = "application/octet-stream";Di2015NewLine    state.Context.Response.AddHeader("Content-Disposition", "attachment; filename=attachment.pdf");Di2015NewLine    // Write directly into the output stream, and don't call FlushDi2015NewLine    state.Context.Response.OutputStream.Write(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic bool IsReusable Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine    get { return false; } Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1633404Di2015UniqueSeparator public static void Reconcile<T, TKey>(Di2015NewLine     this BindingList<T> left,Di2015NewLine     BindingList<T> right,Di2015NewLine     Func<T, TKey> keySelector)Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine     var leftDict = left.ToDictionary(l => keySelector(l));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     foreach (var r in right)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine         var key = keySelector(r);Di2015NewLine         T l;Di2015NewLine         if (leftDict.TryGetValue(key, out l))Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine              // copy properties from r to lDi2015NewLine              ...Di2015NewLine              leftDict.RemoveKey(key);Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine         elseDi2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine              left.Add(r);Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     foreach (var key in leftDict.Keys)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine         left.RemoveKey(key);Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine

1633419Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var client = new TcpClient())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var server = "smtp.gmail.com";Di2015NewLine            var port = 465;Di2015NewLine            client.Connect(server, port);Di2015NewLine            // As GMail requires SSL we should use SslStreamDi2015NewLine            // If your SMTP server doesn't support SSL you canDi2015NewLine            // work directly with the underlying streamDi2015NewLine            using (var stream = client.GetStream())Di2015NewLine            using (var sslStream = new SslStream(stream))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sslStream.AuthenticateAsClient(server);Di2015NewLine                using (var writer = new StreamWriter(sslStream))Di2015NewLine                using (var reader = new StreamReader(sslStream))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    writer.WriteLine("EHLO " + server);Di2015NewLine                    writer.Flush();Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine(reader.ReadLine());Di2015NewLine                    // GMail responds with: 220 mx.google.com ESMTPDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1634060Di2015UniqueSeparator    public void AddItem(TreeView treeControl, TreeNode parent, string item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TreeNodeCollection nodesRef = (parent != null) ? parent.Nodes : treeControl.Nodes;Di2015NewLine        string currentNodeName;Di2015NewLine        if (-1 == item.IndexOf('/')) currentNodeName = item;Di2015NewLine        else  currentNodeName = item.Substring(0, item.IndexOf('/'));Di2015NewLine        if (nodesRef.ContainsKey(currentNodeName))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            AddItem(treeControl, nodesRef[currentNodeName], item.Substring(currentNodeName.Length+1));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TreeNode newItem = nodesRef.Add(currentNodeName, currentNodeName);Di2015NewLine            if (item.Length > currentNodeName.Length)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                AddItem(treeControl, newItem, item.Substring(item.IndexOf('/', currentNodeName.Length) + 1));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

1634333Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate bool IsDestinationNodeAChildOfDraggingNode(TreeNode draggingNode, TreeNode destinationNode) {Di2015NewLine  // special case, no childrenDi2015NewLine  if (draggingNode.Nodes.Count == 0) Di2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // check if the target is one of my childrenDi2015NewLine  if (draggingNode.Nodes.Contains(destinationNode)) Di2015NewLine     return true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // recursively check each of my children to see if one of their descendants is the targetDi2015NewLine  foreach (TreeNode node in draggingNode.Nodes) Di2015NewLine    if (IsDestinationNodeAChildOfDraggingNode(node, destinationNode)) Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // didn't find anythingDi2015NewLine  return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1634333Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate bool IsDestinationNodeAChildOfDraggingNode(TreeNode draggingNode, TreeNode destinationNode) {Di2015NewLine  bool retVal = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if (draggingNode.Nodes.Count != 0) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // check if the target is one of my childrenDi2015NewLine    if (draggingNode.Nodes.Contains(destinationNode)) {Di2015NewLine      retVal = true;Di2015NewLine    } else {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // recursively check each of my children to see if one of their descendants is the targetDi2015NewLine      foreach (TreeNode node in draggingNode.Nodes) Di2015NewLine        if (IsDestinationNodeAChildOfDraggingNode(node, destinationNode)) {Di2015NewLine          retVal = true;Di2015NewLine          break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return retVal;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1635049Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class SymbolicDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static Expression Expand(Expression expression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new ExpandVisitor().Visit(expression);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Expression Simplify(Expression expression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new SimplifyVisitor().Visit(expression);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Expression PartialDerivative(Expression expression, ParameterExpression parameter)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool totalDerivative = false;Di2015NewLine        return new DerivativeVisitor(parameter, totalDerivative).Visit(expression);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string ToString(Expression expression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ConstantExpression result = (ConstantExpression)new ListPrintVisitor().Visit(expression);Di2015NewLine        return result.Value.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1635049Di2015UniqueSeparatorExpandVisitor
1635049Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal class ExpandVisitor : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    protected override Expression VisitBinary(BinaryExpression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var left = Visit(node.Left);Di2015NewLine        var right = Visit(node.Right);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (node.NodeType == ExpressionType.Multiply)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Expression[] leftNodes = GetAddedNodes(left).ToArray();Di2015NewLine            Expression[] rightNodes = GetAddedNodes(right).ToArray();Di2015NewLine            var result =Di2015NewLine                leftNodesDi2015NewLine                .SelectMany(x => rightNodes.Select(y => Expression.Multiply(x, y)))Di2015NewLine                .Aggregate((sum, term) => Expression.Add(sum, term));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (node.Left == left && node.Right == right)Di2015NewLine            return node;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Expression.MakeBinary(node.NodeType, left, right, node.IsLiftedToNull, node.Method, node.Conversion);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Treats the <paramref name="node"/> as the sum (or difference) of one or more child nodes and returns theDi2015NewLine    /// the individual addends in the sum.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private static IEnumerable<Expression> GetAddedNodes(Expression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        BinaryExpression binary = node as BinaryExpression;Di2015NewLine        if (binary != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            switch (binary.NodeType)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.Add:Di2015NewLine                foreach (var n in GetAddedNodes(binary.Left))Di2015NewLine                    yield return n;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                foreach (var n in GetAddedNodes(binary.Right))Di2015NewLine                    yield return n;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                yield break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.Subtract:Di2015NewLine                foreach (var n in GetAddedNodes(binary.Left))Di2015NewLine                    yield return n;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                foreach (var n in GetAddedNodes(binary.Right))Di2015NewLine                    yield return Expression.Negate(n);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                yield break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        yield return node;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1635049Di2015UniqueSeparatorDerivativeVisitor
1635049Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal class DerivativeVisitor : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private ParameterExpression _parameter;Di2015NewLine    private bool _totalDerivative;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public DerivativeVisitor(ParameterExpression parameter, bool totalDerivative)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_totalDerivative)Di2015NewLine            throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _parameter = parameter;Di2015NewLine        _totalDerivative = totalDerivative;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override Expression VisitBinary(BinaryExpression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        switch (node.NodeType)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        case ExpressionType.Add:Di2015NewLine        case ExpressionType.Subtract:Di2015NewLine            return Expression.MakeBinary(node.NodeType, Visit(node.Left), Visit(node.Right));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        case ExpressionType.Multiply:Di2015NewLine            return Expression.Add(Expression.Multiply(node.Left, Visit(node.Right)), Expression.Multiply(Visit(node.Left), node.Right));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        case ExpressionType.Divide:Di2015NewLine            return Expression.Divide(Expression.Subtract(Expression.Multiply(Visit(node.Left), node.Right), Expression.Multiply(node.Left, Visit(node.Right))), Expression.Power(node.Right, Expression.Constant(2)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        case ExpressionType.Power:Di2015NewLine            if (node.Right is ConstantExpression)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return Expression.Multiply(node.Right, Expression.Multiply(Visit(node.Left), Expression.Subtract(node.Right, Expression.Constant(1))));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (node.Left is ConstantExpression)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return Expression.Multiply(node, MathExpressions.Log(node.Left));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return Expression.Multiply(node, Expression.Add(Di2015NewLine                    Expression.Multiply(Visit(node.Left), Expression.Divide(node.Right, node.Left)),Di2015NewLine                    Expression.Multiply(Visit(node.Right), MathExpressions.Log(node.Left))Di2015NewLine                    ));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        default:Di2015NewLine            throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override Expression VisitConstant(ConstantExpression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return MathExpressions.Zero;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override Expression VisitInvocation(InvocationExpression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MemberExpression memberExpression = node.Expression as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine        if (memberExpression != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var member = memberExpression.Member;Di2015NewLine            if (member.DeclaringType != typeof(Math))Di2015NewLine                throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            switch (member.Name)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine            case "Log":Di2015NewLine                return Expression.Divide(Visit(node.Expression), node.Expression);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            case "Log10":Di2015NewLine                return Expression.Divide(Visit(node.Expression), Expression.Multiply(Expression.Constant(Math.Log(10)), node.Expression));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            case "Exp":Di2015NewLine            case "Sin":Di2015NewLine            case "Cos":Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override Expression VisitParameter(ParameterExpression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (node == _parameter)Di2015NewLine            return MathExpressions.One;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return MathExpressions.Zero;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1635049Di2015UniqueSeparatorSimplifyVisitor
1635049Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal class SimplifyVisitor : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    protected override Expression VisitBinary(BinaryExpression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var left = Visit(node.Left);Di2015NewLine        var right = Visit(node.Right);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ConstantExpression leftConstant = left as ConstantExpression;Di2015NewLine        ConstantExpression rightConstant = right as ConstantExpression;Di2015NewLine        if (leftConstant != null && rightConstant != nullDi2015NewLine            && (leftConstant.Value is double) && (rightConstant.Value is double))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double leftValue = (double)leftConstant.Value;Di2015NewLine            double rightValue = (double)rightConstant.Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            switch (node.NodeType)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.Add:Di2015NewLine                return Expression.Constant(leftValue + rightValue);Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.Subtract:Di2015NewLine                return Expression.Constant(leftValue - rightValue);Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.Multiply:Di2015NewLine                return Expression.Constant(leftValue * rightValue);Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.Divide:Di2015NewLine                return Expression.Constant(leftValue / rightValue);Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        switch (node.NodeType)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        case ExpressionType.Add:Di2015NewLine            if (IsZero(left))Di2015NewLine                return right;Di2015NewLine            if (IsZero(right))Di2015NewLine                return left;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        case ExpressionType.Subtract:Di2015NewLine            if (IsZero(left))Di2015NewLine                return Expression.Negate(right);Di2015NewLine            if (IsZero(right))Di2015NewLine                return left;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        case ExpressionType.Multiply:Di2015NewLine            if (IsZero(left) || IsZero(right))Di2015NewLine                return MathExpressions.Zero;Di2015NewLine            if (IsOne(left))Di2015NewLine                return right;Di2015NewLine            if (IsOne(right))Di2015NewLine                return left;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        case ExpressionType.Divide:Di2015NewLine            if (IsZero(right))Di2015NewLine                throw new DivideByZeroException();Di2015NewLine            if (IsZero(left))Di2015NewLine                return MathExpressions.Zero;Di2015NewLine            if (IsOne(right))Di2015NewLine                return left;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        default:Di2015NewLine            throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Expression.MakeBinary(node.NodeType, left, right);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override Expression VisitUnary(UnaryExpression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var operand = Visit(node.Operand);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ConstantExpression operandConstant = operand as ConstantExpression;Di2015NewLine        if (operandConstant != null && (operandConstant.Value is double))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double operandValue = (double)operandConstant.Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            switch (node.NodeType)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.Negate:Di2015NewLine                if (operandValue == 0.0)Di2015NewLine                    return MathExpressions.Zero;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return Expression.Constant(-operandValue);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        switch (node.NodeType)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        case ExpressionType.Negate:Di2015NewLine            if (operand.NodeType == ExpressionType.Negate)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return ((UnaryExpression)operand).Operand;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        default:Di2015NewLine            throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Expression.MakeUnary(node.NodeType, operand, node.Type);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static bool IsZero(Expression expression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ConstantExpression constant = expression as ConstantExpression;Di2015NewLine        if (constant != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (constant.Value.Equals(0.0))Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static bool IsOne(Expression expression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ConstantExpression constant = expression as ConstantExpression;Di2015NewLine        if (constant != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (constant.Value.Equals(1.0))Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1635049Di2015UniqueSeparatorListPrintVisitor
1635049Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal class ListPrintVisitor : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    protected override Expression VisitBinary(BinaryExpression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string op = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        switch (node.NodeType)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        case ExpressionType.Add:Di2015NewLine            op = "+";Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case ExpressionType.Subtract:Di2015NewLine            op = "-";Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case ExpressionType.Multiply:Di2015NewLine            op = "*";Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case ExpressionType.Divide:Di2015NewLine            op = "/";Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        default:Di2015NewLine            throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var left = Visit(node.Left);Di2015NewLine        var right = Visit(node.Right);Di2015NewLine        string result = string.Format("({0} {1} {2})", op, ((ConstantExpression)left).Value, ((ConstantExpression)right).Value);Di2015NewLine        return Expression.Constant(result);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override Expression VisitConstant(ConstantExpression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (node.Value is string)Di2015NewLine            return node;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Expression.Constant(node.Value.ToString());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override Expression VisitParameter(ParameterExpression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Expression.Constant(node.Name);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1635049Di2015UniqueSeparator[TestMethod]Di2015NewLinepublic void BasicSymbolicTest()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ParameterExpression x = Expression.Parameter(typeof(double), "x");Di2015NewLine    Expression linear = Expression.Add(Expression.Constant(3.0), x);Di2015NewLine    Assert.AreEqual("(+ 3 x)", Symbolic.ToString(linear));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Expression quadratic = Expression.Multiply(linear, Expression.Add(Expression.Constant(2.0), x));Di2015NewLine    Assert.AreEqual("(* (+ 3 x) (+ 2 x))", Symbolic.ToString(quadratic));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Expression expanded = Symbolic.Expand(quadratic);Di2015NewLine    Assert.AreEqual("(+ (+ (+ (* 3 2) (* 3 x)) (* x 2)) (* x x))", Symbolic.ToString(expanded));Di2015NewLine    Assert.AreEqual("(+ (+ (+ 6 (* 3 x)) (* x 2)) (* x x))", Symbolic.ToString(Symbolic.Simplify(expanded)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Expression derivative = Symbolic.PartialDerivative(expanded, x);Di2015NewLine    Assert.AreEqual("(+ (+ (+ (+ (* 3 0) (* 0 2)) (+ (* 3 1) (* 0 x))) (+ (* x 0) (* 1 2))) (+ (* x 1) (* 1 x)))", Symbolic.ToString(derivative));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Expression simplified = Symbolic.Simplify(derivative);Di2015NewLine    Assert.AreEqual("(+ 5 (+ x x))", Symbolic.ToString(simplified));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1641510Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic interface RowNumberStrategy {Di2015NewLinepublic int getNextRowNumber();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class OriginalRowStrategy implements RowNumberStrategy{Di2015NewLine    int middle;Di2015NewLine    boolean tryHarder = false;Di2015NewLine    int rowStep;Di2015NewLine    int maxLines;Di2015NewLine    int maxRows;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int x;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public OriginalRowStrategy(int maxRows, boolean tryHarder) {Di2015NewLine        this.x = 0;Di2015NewLine        this.maxRows = maxRows;Di2015NewLine        this.middle = maxRows >> 1; // divide by 2Di2015NewLine        this.tryHarder = tryHarder;Di2015NewLine        rowStep = Math.max(1, maxRows >> (tryHarder ? 7 : 4));Di2015NewLine        if (tryHarder) {Di2015NewLine          maxLines = maxRows; // Look at the whole image, not just the centerDi2015NewLine        } else {Di2015NewLine          maxLines = 9; // Nine rows spaced 1/16 apart is roughly the middle half of the imageDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int getNextRowNumber() {Di2015NewLine        if (x > maxLines)Di2015NewLine            return -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int rowStepsAboveOrBelow = (x + 1) >> 1;Di2015NewLine        boolean isAbove = (x & 0x01) == 0; // i.e. is x even?Di2015NewLine        int rowNumber = middle + rowStep * (isAbove ? rowStepsAboveOrBelow : -rowStepsAboveOrBelow);Di2015NewLine        if (rowNumber < 0 || rowNumber >= maxRows) {Di2015NewLine          // Oops, if we run off the top or bottom, stopDi2015NewLine          return -1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        x = x + 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return rowNumber;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class LinearScanRowStrategy implements RowNumberStrategy{Di2015NewLine    private final int maxRows;Di2015NewLine    private int currentRow;Di2015NewLine    public LinearScanRowStrategy(int totalRows) {Di2015NewLine        maxRows = totalRows;Di2015NewLine        currentRow = 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int getNextRowNumber() {Di2015NewLine        if (currentRow > maxRows)Di2015NewLine            return -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return maxRows - 1 - currentRow++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ProgressiveScanRowStrategy implements RowNumberStrategy{Di2015NewLine    private final int maxRows;Di2015NewLine    private int currentStepSize;Di2015NewLine    private int currentStep;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ProgressiveScanRowStrategy(int totalRows) {Di2015NewLine        maxRows = totalRows;Di2015NewLine        currentStep = 0;Di2015NewLine        currentStepSize = maxRows;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int getNextRowNumber() {Di2015NewLine        int nextRow = (currentStep++) * currentStepSize;Di2015NewLine        if (nextRow < maxRows)Di2015NewLine            return nextRow;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        currentStepSize = currentStepSize >> 1;Di2015NewLine        if (currentStepSize <= 0)Di2015NewLine            return -1;Di2015NewLine        currentStep = 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        nextRow = currentStep * currentStepSize;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return nextRow;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1641510Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate Result doDecode(MonochromeBitmapSource image, Hashtable hints) throws ReaderException {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint width = image.getWidth();Di2015NewLineint height = image.getHeight();Di2015NewLineBitArray row = new BitArray(width);Di2015NewLineboolean tryHarder = hints != null && hints.containsKey(DecodeHintType.TRY_HARDER);Di2015NewLineRowNumberStrategy rowProvider = new RowNumberStrategy.ProgressiveScanRowStrategy(height);  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint rowNumber;Di2015NewLinewhile ((rowNumber = rowProvider.getNextRowNumber()) != -1){Di2015NewLine...Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1644596Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T[] BubbleSort(T[] input) where T : IComparable<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return BubbleSort(input, 0, 0);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static T[] BubbleSort(T[] input, int passStartIndex, int currentIndex) where T : IComparable<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if(passStartIndex == input.Length - 1) return input;Di2015NewLine    if(currentIndex == input.Length - 1) return BubbleSort(input, passStartIndex+1, passStartIndex+1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //compare items at current index and current index + 1 and swap if requiredDi2015NewLine    int nextIndex = currentIndex + 1;Di2015NewLine    if(input[currentIndex].CompareTo(input[nextIndex]) > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    \T temp = input[nextIndex];Di2015NewLine    \input[nextIndex] = input[currentIndex];Di2015NewLine    \input[currentIndex] = temp;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return BubbleSort(input, passStartIndex, currentIndex + 1);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

private static readonly Dictionary<string, Uri> KnownUris = new Dictionary<string, Uri>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            { "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN", new };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private bool enableHttpCaching;Di2015NewLine        private ICredentials credentials;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public LocalXhtmlXmlResolver(bool enableHttpCaching)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.enableHttpCaching = enableHttpCaching;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override Uri ResolveUri(Uri baseUri, string relativeUri)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Debug.WriteLineIf(!KnownUris.ContainsKey(relativeUri), "Could not find: " + relativeUri);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine 1647296Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplication1 {Di2015NewLine    [AttributeUsage(AttributeTargets.Method)]Di2015NewLine    internal class ProvidesAttribute : Attribute {Di2015NewLine        private String[] _strings;Di2015NewLine        public ProvidesAttribute(params String[] strings) {Di2015NewLine            _strings = strings;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public bool Contains(String str) {Di2015NewLine            foreach (String test in _strings) {Di2015NewLine                if (test.Equals(str)) {Di2015NewLine                    return true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal class Program {Di2015NewLine        [Provides("hello", "goodbye")]Di2015NewLine        public void HandleSomeStuff(String str) {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("some stuff: {0}", str);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [Provides("this")]Di2015NewLine        public void HandleMoreStuff(String str) {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("more stuff: {0}", str);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void HandleString(String str) {Di2015NewLine            // we could loop through each Type in the assembly here instead of just looking at theDi2015NewLine            // methods of Program; this would allow us to push our "providers" out to other classesDi2015NewLine            MethodInfo[] methods = typeof(Program).GetMethods();Di2015NewLine            foreach (MethodInfo method in methods) {Di2015NewLine                Attribute attr = Attribute.GetCustomAttribute(method, typeof(ProvidesAttribute));Di2015NewLine                ProvidesAttribute prov = attr as ProvidesAttribute;Di2015NewLine                if ((prov != null) && (prov.Contains(str))) {Di2015NewLine                    method.Invoke(this, new Object[] { str } );Di2015NewLine                    break;  // removing this enables multiple "providers"Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        internal static void Main(String[] args) {Di2015NewLine            Program prog = new Program();Di2015NewLine            foreach (String str in args) {Di2015NewLine                prog.HandleString(str);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1652911Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System; Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class ObjectHelper<t> Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine    public static int Compare(T x, T y) Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine    \Type type = typeof(T); Di2015NewLine    \var publicBinding = BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly | BindingFlags.Public;Di2015NewLine    \PropertyInfo[] properties = type.GetProperties(publicBinding); Di2015NewLine    \FieldInfo[] fields = type.GetFields(publicBinding); Di2015NewLine    \int compareValue = 0; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    \foreach (PropertyInfo property in properties) Di2015NewLine    \{ Di2015NewLine    \\IComparable valx = property.GetValue(x, null) as IComparable; Di2015NewLine    \\if (valx == null) Di2015NewLine    \\\continue; Di2015NewLine    \\object valy = property.GetValue(y, null); Di2015NewLine    \\compareValue = valx.CompareTo(valy); Di2015NewLine    \\if (compareValue != 0) Di2015NewLine    \\\return compareValue; Di2015NewLine    \} Di2015NewLine    \foreach (FieldInfo field in fields) Di2015NewLine    \{ Di2015NewLine    \\IComparable valx = field.GetValue(x) as IComparable; Di2015NewLine    \\if (valx == null) Di2015NewLine    \\\continue; Di2015NewLine    \\object valy = field.GetValue(y); Di2015NewLine    \\compareValue = valx.CompareTo(valy); Di2015NewLine    \\if (compareValue != 0) Di2015NewLine    \\\return compareValue; Di2015NewLine    \} Di2015NewLine    return compareValue; Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1653508Di2015UniqueSeparatorGetFilesFromRequest
1653508Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static FileUploadResultDTO GetFilesFromRequest(HttpContextWrapper contextWrapper)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        FileUploadResultDTO result = new FileUploadResultDTO();Di2015NewLine        result.Files = new List<File>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (string file in contextWrapper.Request.Files)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            HttpPostedFileBase hpf = contextWrapper.Request.Files[file] as HttpPostedFileBase;Di2015NewLine            if (hpf.ContentLength > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                File tempFile = new File()Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    UploadFileName = Regex.Match(hpf.FileName, @"(/|\\\\)?(?<fileName>[^(/|\\\\)]+)$").Groups["fileName"].ToString(),   // to trim off whole path from browsers like IEDi2015NewLine                    MimeType = hpf.ContentType,Di2015NewLine                    Data = FileService.ReadFully(hpf.InputStream, 0),Di2015NewLine                    Length = (int)hpf.InputStream.LengthDi2015NewLine                };Di2015NewLine                result.Files.Add(tempFile);Di2015NewLine                result.TotalBytes += tempFile.Length;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
1653508Di2015UniqueSeparatorReadFully
1653508Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Reads data from a stream until the end is reached. TheDi2015NewLine    /// data is returned as a byte array. An IOException isDi2015NewLine    /// thrown if any of the underlying IO calls fail.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="stream">The stream to read data from</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="initialLength">The initial buffer length</param>Di2015NewLine    public static byte[] ReadFully(System.IO.Stream stream, long initialLength)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // reset pointer just in caseDi2015NewLine        stream.Seek(0, System.IO.SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // If we've been passed an unhelpful initial length, justDi2015NewLine        // use 32K.Di2015NewLine        if (initialLength < 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            initialLength = 32768;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte[] buffer = new byte[initialLength];Di2015NewLine        int read = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int chunk;Di2015NewLine        while ((chunk = stream.Read(buffer, read, buffer.Length - read)) > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            read += chunk;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // If we've reached the end of our buffer, check to see if there'sDi2015NewLine            // any more informationDi2015NewLine            if (read == buffer.Length)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int nextByte = stream.ReadByte();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // End of stream? If so, we're doneDi2015NewLine                if (nextByte == -1)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return buffer;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Nope. Resize the buffer, put in the byte we've justDi2015NewLine                // read, and continueDi2015NewLine                byte[] newBuffer = new byte[buffer.Length * 2];Di2015NewLine                Array.Copy(buffer, newBuffer, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine                newBuffer[read] = (byte)nextByte;Di2015NewLine                buffer = newBuffer;Di2015NewLine                read++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // Buffer is now too big. Shrink it.Di2015NewLine        byte[] ret = new byte[read];Di2015NewLine        Array.Copy(buffer, ret, read);Di2015NewLine        return ret;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

1660807Di2015UniqueSeparator// expand this list to contain all your variantsDi2015NewLine// this is basically all you need to adjust (!!!)Di2015NewLinepublic delegate int Function01(byte[] b);Di2015NewLinepublic delegate int Function02();Di2015NewLinepublic delegate void Function03();Di2015NewLinepublic delegate double Function04(int p, byte b, short s);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// TODO: add some typical error handlingDi2015NewLinepublic T CreateDynamicDllInvoke<T>(string functionName, string library)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // create in-memory assembly, module and typeDi2015NewLine    AssemblyBuilder assemblyBuilder = AppDomain.CurrentDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly(Di2015NewLine        new AssemblyName("DynamicDllInvoke"),Di2015NewLine        AssemblyBuilderAccess.Run);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ModuleBuilder modBuilder = assemblyBuilder.DefineDynamicModule("DynamicDllModule");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // note: without TypeBuilder, you can create global functionsDi2015NewLine    // on the module level, but you cannot create delegates to themDi2015NewLine    TypeBuilder typeBuilder = modBuilder.DefineType(Di2015NewLine        "DynamicDllInvokeType",Di2015NewLine        TypeAttributes.Public | TypeAttributes.UnicodeClass);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // get params from delegate dynamically (!), trick from Eric LippertDi2015NewLine    MethodInfo delegateMI = typeof(T).GetMethod("Invoke");Di2015NewLine    Type[] delegateParams = (from param in delegateMI.GetParameters()Di2015NewLine                            select param.ParameterType).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // automatically create the correct signagure for PInvokeDi2015NewLine    MethodBuilder methodBuilder = typeBuilder.DefinePInvokeMethod(Di2015NewLine        functionName,Di2015NewLine        library,Di2015NewLine        MethodAttributes.Public |Di2015NewLine        MethodAttributes.Static |Di2015NewLine        MethodAttributes.PinvokeImpl,Di2015NewLine        CallingConventions.Standard,Di2015NewLine        delegateMI.ReturnType,        /* the return type */Di2015NewLine        delegateParams,               /* array of parameters from delegate T */Di2015NewLine        CallingConvention.Winapi,Di2015NewLine        CharSet.Ansi);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // needed according to MSDNDi2015NewLine    methodBuilder.SetImplementationFlags(Di2015NewLine        methodBuilder.GetMethodImplementationFlags() |Di2015NewLine        MethodImplAttributes.PreserveSig);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Type dynamicType = typeBuilder.CreateType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    MethodInfo methodInfo = dynamicType.GetMethod(functionName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // create the delegate of type T, double casting is necessaryDi2015NewLine    return (T) (object) Delegate.CreateDelegate(Di2015NewLine        typeof(T),Di2015NewLine        methodInfo, true);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// call it as follows, simply use the appropriate delegate and theDi2015NewLine// the rest "just works":Di2015NewLineFunction02 getTickCount = CreateDynamicDllInvoke<Function02>Di2015NewLine    ("GetTickCount", "kernel32.dll");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDebug.WriteLine(getTickCount());Di2015NewLine

1660938Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   byte[] bytes = HexToBin("0eff10");Di2015NewLine   Console.WriteLine(BytesToBinaryString(bytes));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic byte[] HexToBin(string hex)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   var result = new byte[hex.Length / 2];Di2015NewLine   for (int i = 0; i < hex.Length; i += 2)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      result[i / 2] = byte.Parse(hex.Substring(i, 2), System.Globalization.NumberStyles.HexNumber);Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic string BytesToBinaryString(byte[] bytes)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   var ba = new System.Collections.BitArray(bytes);Di2015NewLine   System.Text.StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine   for (int i = 0; i < ba.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      int byteStart = (i / 8) * 8;Di2015NewLine      int bit = 7 - i % 8;Di2015NewLine      sb.Append(ba[byteStart + bit] ? '1' : '0');Di2015NewLine      if (i % 8 == 7)Di2015NewLine         sb.Append(' ');Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
