1662356Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Provides a set of static (Shared in Visual Basic) methods for starting a fluent expression on a <see cref="System.Windows.Form.Control"/> object.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic static class ControlExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Starts a fluent expression that occurs when a key is pressed.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="control">The control on which the fluent keyboard expression is occuring.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="keys">The key when it will happen.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>A <see cref="KeyboardFluent"/> object that makes it possible to write a fluent expression.</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static KeyboardFluent When(this Control control, Keys keys)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new KeyboardFluent(control).When(keys);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1662356Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Represents a fluent expression for handling keyboard event.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic class KeyboardFluentDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// The control on which the fluent keyboard expression is occuring.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private Control control;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// The KeyDown and KeyUp handler.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private KeyEventHandler keyHandler;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Stores if the IsDown method was called and that the KeyDown event is registered.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private bool isDownRegistered = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Stores if the IsUp method was called and that the KeyUp event is registered.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private bool isUpRegistered = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// The list of keys that will make the actions be executed when they are down or up.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private List<Keys> triggerKeys;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// The modifiers keys that must be down at the same time than the trigger keys for the actions to be executed.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private Keys modifiers;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// The list of actions that will be executed when the trigger keys and modifiers are down or up.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private List<Action<object, KeyEventArgs>> actions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="KeyboardFluent"/> class.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="control">The control on which the fluent keyboard expression is occuring.</param>Di2015NewLine    public KeyboardFluent(Control control)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.control = control;Di2015NewLine        this.triggerKeys = new List<Keys>();Di2015NewLine        this.actions = new List<Action<object, KeyEventArgs>>();Di2015NewLine        this.keyHandler = new KeyEventHandler(OnKeyHandler);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Handles the KeyDown or KeyUp event on the control.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="sender">The control on which the event is occuring.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="e">A <see cref="KeyEventArgs"/> that gives information about the keyboard event.</param>Di2015NewLine    private void OnKeyHandler(object sender, KeyEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (this.triggerKeys.Contains(e.KeyCode) && e.Modifiers == this.modifiers)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.actions.ForEach(action => action(sender, e));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Makes the keyboard event occured when a key is pressed down.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Returns itself to allow a fluent expression structure.</returns>Di2015NewLine    public KeyboardFluent IsDown()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!isDownRegistered)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.control.KeyDown += this.keyHandler;Di2015NewLine            isDownRegistered = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return this;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Makes the keyboard event occured when a key is pressed up.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Returns itself to allow a fluent expression structure.</returns>Di2015NewLine    public KeyboardFluent IsUp()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!isUpRegistered)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.control.KeyUp += this.keyHandler;Di2015NewLine            isUpRegistered = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return this;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Creates a new trigger on a key.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="key">The key on which the actions will occur.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Returns itself to allow a fluent expression structure.</returns>Di2015NewLine    public KeyboardFluent When(Keys key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.triggerKeys.Add(key);Di2015NewLine        return this;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Adds a modifier filter that is checked before the action are executed.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="modifiers">The modifier key.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Returns itself to allow a fluent expression structure.</returns>Di2015NewLine    public KeyboardFluent With(Keys modifiers)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.modifiers |= modifiers;Di2015NewLine        return this;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Executes the action when the specified keys and modified are either pressed down or up.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="action">The action to be executed.</param>Di2015NewLine 1662890Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Net.Sockets;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ServerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    internal class SimpleServerDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private static SimpleServer server;Di2015NewLine        private readonly TcpListener socket;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private SimpleServer(int port)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(">> Starting SimpleServer");Di2015NewLine            socket = new TcpListener(port);Di2015NewLine            socket.Start(); Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void DoJob()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                bool done = false;Di2015NewLine                while (!done)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    TcpClient client = socket.AcceptTcpClient();Di2015NewLine                    NetworkStream stream = client.GetStream();Di2015NewLine                    var reader = new StreamReader(stream, Encoding.UTF8);Di2015NewLine                    String str = reader.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine                    if (str == null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        done = true;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        printOut(str, stream);Di2015NewLine                        if (str.Trim() == "EXIT")Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            done = true;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    client.Close();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(e);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static void main(String[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int port = 8080;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                port = Int32.Parse(args[0]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Catch exception and keep going. Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            server = new SimpleServer(port);Di2015NewLine            server.DoJob();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void printOut(String str, Stream stream)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte[] bytes = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes("Echo: " + str + "\\r\\n");Di2015NewLine            stream.Write(bytes, 0, bytes.Length);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(str);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1666818Di2015UniqueSeparator[AddIn("Sample Calculator AddIn", Version="1.0.0.0")]Di2015NewLinepublic class SampleCalculatorAddIn : CalculatorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override double Add(double a, double b)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return a + b;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override double Subtract(double a, double b)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return a-b;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override double Multiply(double a, double b)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return a * b;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override double Divide(double a, double b)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return a / b;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1666818Di2015UniqueSeparator// In this sample we expect the AddIns and components to Di2015NewLine// be installed in the current directoryDi2015NewLineString addInRoot = Environment.CurrentDirectory;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Check to see if new AddIns have been installedDi2015NewLineAddInStore.Rebuild(addInRoot);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Look for Calculator AddIns in our root directory and Di2015NewLine// store the resultsDi2015NewLineCollection<AddInToken> tokens = Di2015NewLine    AddInStore.FindAddIns(typeof(Calculator), addInRoot);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Ask the user which AddIn they would like to useDi2015NewLineAddInToken calcToken = ChooseCalculator(tokens);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Activate the selected AddInToken in a new AppDomain set sandboxed Di2015NewLine// in the internet zone. You can find out what this gives accessDi2015NewLine// to by running "mscorcfg.msc", but essentially this will limitDi2015NewLine// any access to the filesystem and other obvious OS services.Di2015NewLine// Use of reflection is also very limited in this zone.Di2015NewLineCalculator calculator = Di2015NewLine    calcToken.Activate<Calculator>(AddInSecurityLevel.Internet);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Run the read-eval-print loopDi2015NewLineRunCalculator(calculator);Di2015NewLine

1670011Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.InteropServices;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic class Program {Di2015NewLine  static void Main() {Di2015NewLine    //Allocate the executable buffer on a distinct page Di2015NewLine    // rather than just pinning it in place because weDi2015NewLine    // need to mark the page as executable.Di2015NewLine    // Failing to do this would cause NX-enabled machines Di2015NewLine    // to have access violations attempting to execute.Di2015NewLine    IntPtr pExecutableBuffer = VirtualAlloc(Di2015NewLine      IntPtr.Zero,Di2015NewLine      new IntPtr(CPUID_32.Length),Di2015NewLine      AllocationType.MEM_COMMIT | AllocationType.MEM_RESERVE,Di2015NewLine      MemoryProtection.PAGE_EXECUTE_READWRITEDi2015NewLine    );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Marshal.Copy(CPUID_32, 0, pExecutableBuffer, CPUID_32.Length);Di2015NewLine    CPUID executeHandler = (CPUID)Marshal.GetDelegateForFunctionPointer(Di2015NewLine      pExecutableBuffer, typeof(CPUID));Di2015NewLine    CPUID_Args args = new CPUID_Args();Di2015NewLine    args.eax = 0;Di2015NewLine    executeHandler(ref args);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("eax: {0} ebx: {1} ecx: {2} edx: {3}",Di2015NewLine      args.eax,Di2015NewLine      args.ebx,Di2015NewLine      args.ecx,Di2015NewLine      args.edx);Di2015NewLine    VirtualFree(Di2015NewLine      pExecutableBuffer,Di2015NewLine      IntPtr.Zero,Di2015NewLine      FreeType.MEM_RELEASE);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  [UnmanagedFunctionPointer(CallingConvention.StdCall)]Di2015NewLine  delegate void CPUID(ref CPUID_Args args);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private static readonly byte[] CPUID_32 = new byte[] {Di2015NewLine    0x53,          // push ebx Di2015NewLine    0x57,          // push edi Di2015NewLine    0x8B, 0x7C, 0x24, 0x0C, // mov edi,dword ptr [esp+0Ch] Di2015NewLine    0x8B, 0x07,       // mov eax,dword ptr [edi] Di2015NewLine    0x8B, 0x4F, 0x08,    // mov ecx,dword ptr [edi+8] Di2015NewLine    0x0F, 0xA2,       // cpuid      Di2015NewLine    0x89, 0x07,       // mov dword ptr [edi],eax Di2015NewLine    0x89, 0x5F, 0x04,    // mov dword ptr [edi+4],ebx Di2015NewLine    0x89, 0x4F, 0x08 ,    // movdword ptr [edi+8],ecx Di2015NewLine    0x89, 0x57, 0x0C ,    // mov dword ptr [edi+0Ch],edx Di2015NewLine    0x5F,          // pop     edi Di2015NewLine    0x5B,          // pop     ebx Di2015NewLine    0xC2, 0x04, 0x00     // retDi2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  [Flags]Di2015NewLine  enum AllocationType {Di2015NewLine    MEM_COMMIT = 0x1000,Di2015NewLine    MEM_RESERVE = 0x2000,Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  [Flags]Di2015NewLine  enum MemoryProtection {Di2015NewLine    PAGE_EXECUTE_READWRITE = 0x40,Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  [Flags]Di2015NewLine  enum FreeType {Di2015NewLine    MEM_RELEASE = 0x8000Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  [DllImport("kernel32.dll")]Di2015NewLine  static extern IntPtr VirtualAlloc(Di2015NewLine    IntPtr lpAddress,Di2015NewLine    IntPtr dwSize,Di2015NewLine    AllocationType flAllocationType,Di2015NewLine    MemoryProtection flProtect);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  [DllImport("kernel32.dll")]Di2015NewLine  [return: MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.Bool)]Di2015NewLine  static extern bool VirtualFree(Di2015NewLine    IntPtr lpAddress,Di2015NewLine    IntPtr dwSize,Di2015NewLine    FreeType dwFreeType);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential)]Di2015NewLinestruct CPUID_Args {Di2015NewLine  public uint eax;Di2015NewLine  public uint ebx;Di2015NewLine  public uint ecx;Di2015NewLine  public uint edx;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1671544Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate const int RowCount = 10;Di2015NewLineprivate DataTable _table;  // updated elsewhereDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void OnPaint(Object sender, PaintEventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine    if (! this.DesignMode) {Di2015NewLine        DrawTable(e.Graphics);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void DrawTable(Graphics gfx) {Di2015NewLine    SolidBrush brush = new SolidBrush(this.ForeColor);Di2015NewLine    for (int rownum = 0; rownum < RowCount; rownum++) {Di2015NewLine        RectangleF rect = GetRowBounds(rownum);Di2015NewLine        DrawRowNumber(gfx, rect, rownum);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (_table.Rows.Count > rownum) {Di2015NewLine            DataRow data = _table.Rows[rownum];Di2015NewLine            DrawName(gfx, rect, Convert.ToString(data["name"]));Di2015NewLine            DrawCount(gfx, rect, Convert.ToSingle(data["count"]));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void DrawRowNumber(Graphics gfx, RectangleF bounds, int place) {Di2015NewLine    String str = String.Format("{0}.", (place + 1));Di2015NewLine    SolidBrush brush = new SolidBrush(this.ForeColor);Di2015NewLine    gfx.DrawString(str, this.Font, brush, bounds.Location);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void DrawName(Graphics gfx, RectangleF bounds, String name) {Di2015NewLine    PointF loc = new PointF(80, bounds.Top);Di2015NewLine    SolidBrush brush = new SolidBrush(this.ForeColor);Di2015NewLine    gfx.DrawString(name, this.Font, brush, loc);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void DrawCount(Graphics gfx, RectangleF bounds, float score) {Di2015NewLine    SolidBrush brush = new SolidBrush(this.ForeColor);Di2015NewLine    String str = score.ToString("N1");Di2015NewLine    SizeF size = gfx.MeasureString(str, this.Font);Di2015NewLine    float offset = bounds.Right - size.Width;Di2015NewLine    PointF loc = new PointF(offset, bounds.Top);Di2015NewLine    gfx.DrawString(str, this.Font, brush, loc);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate RectangleF GetRowBounds(int row) {Di2015NewLine    if ((row < 0) || (row >= RowCount)) {Di2015NewLine        return RectangleF.Empty;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Rectangle bounds = this.ClientRectangle;Di2015NewLine    float height = (float) bounds.Height / (float) RowCount;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    PointF loc = new PointF(bounds.Left, height * row);Di2015NewLine    SizeF size = new SizeF(bounds.Width, height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return new RectangleF(loc, size);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
